text: A NN tax is paid by businesses and industries that produce NN dioxide through their operations . The tax is designed to reduce the output of NN gases and NN dioxide , a colorless and odorless incombustible gas , into the atmosphere . The tax is imposed with the goal of JJ protection . A tax designed to mitigate or remove the negative externalities of NN emission , a NN tax is a type of Pigovian tax . NN is VBN in every kind of hydrocarbon fuel ( including coal , petroleum , and natural gas ) and is released as the harmful toxin NN dioxide ( CO ) when this kind of fuel is burned . CO is the compound primarily responsible for the " NN " effect of trapping heat within the NNP 's atmosphere , and is , therefore , CD of the primary causes of JJ NN . A NN tax is RB referred to as a form of NN pricing on NN gas NNS where a fixed NN is set by the NN for NN NNS in certain sectors . The NN is passed through from businesses to consumers . By increasing the cost of NN NNS , governments hope to curb consumption , reduce the demand for fossil fuels , and push more NNS toward creating environmentally - friendly substitutes . A NN tax is a NN for a NN to exert some NN over NN NNS without resorting to the levers of a command economy , by which the NN MD VB the means of production and manually halt NN NNS . Any NN VBN in manufactured NNS IN plastics that is not burned is not taxed . The same applies to any CO that is permanently isolated from production and is not released into the atmosphere . But the tax is paid during the upstream process , or when the fuel or gas is extracted from the NNP . Producers can then pass on the tax to the NN by as much as they can . This , in turn , gives consumers a chance to reduce their own NN footprints . NN taxes have been implemented in a number of NNS IN the NN . They take several JJ forms , but most amount to a straightforward rate of taxation per ton of hydrocarbon fuel VBN . The JJ country to implement a NN tax was Finland , in 1990 . That levy currently stands at $ 24.39 dollars per ton of NN . The Finns were quickly followed by other Nordic NNS — Sweden and Norway both implemented their own NN taxes in 1991 . Starting at a rate of $ 51 per ton of CO VBN in gasoline ( the tax MD later decrease considerably ) , the Norwegian tax is among the most stringent in the NN . Most forms of NN taxation have been deployed successfully , but Australia 's failed attempt from 2012 - 2014 stands in stark contrast . The minority Green party was able to broker the NN tax during a period of JJ stagnation in 2011 , but the tax never garnered the support of either of the main parties in Australia , the left - leaning Labor Party ( which reluctantly agreed to the tax to form a NN with the Greens ) and the center - JJ Liberals , whose leader Tony Abbott spearheaded the 2014 repeal . IN most JJ initiatives to combat NN NN , NN taxes remain highly controversial .

text: NN wo n't be the last outbreak . NN NN , waning habitat will drive NN Researchers are n't clear yet about how the novel NN began infecting NNS , but VBP it seems to have originated in bats , making it the latest in a string of emerging JJ NN that spread from animals . NN and wildlife experts VBP they expect to VB a rise in diseases transmitted among animals , plants and NNS , and in particular , more frequent outbreaks in NNS of diseases that come from animals . Such " zoonotic " diseases already make up the majority of JJ infections in NNS . But animals are n't to blame for the increase in JJ outbreaks , according to Arizona NNP NNP virologist Arvind Varsani . NNS are . Varsani researches the emergence of diseases IN the globe and he VBD CD major factors likely to impact the dynamics of NN spread are NN NN and NNS in land use due to urbanization or agriculture . Both factors put animals under strain , forcing them to compete for resources in shrinking habitats and making them opportune hosts for zoonotic diseases , which more easily infect stressed animals . Shrinking suitable habitat amid urbanization and the rapid expansion of agriculture RB cluster animals closer together with NNS and domestic animals . That allows the viruses to jump from CD host to the next . “ You stress these animals and that means you ’re creating an environment for viruses to succeed , where in most NNS the viruses MD ’ve been put to check , " he VBD . " And with that , everyone is in very , very close proximity to each other , so what you ’ve got is CD event — and you only VBP CD event to take off — and the next thing you VBP , it 's spilling over . ” And sometimes , the viruses spill over into NNS . According to a CD report from the NNP Nations Environment Programme , RB 60 percent of all infectious diseases in NNS are zoonotic , as well as 75 percent of all emerging infectious diseases . Researchers RB detected an increase in the rate of JJ , emerging infectious diseases , according to the report . In the NN of the novel NN , the source is believed to be a NN in Wuhan , NNP , that sold both dead and live animals . Arizona Game and Fish wildlife veterinarian Anne Justice - Allen VBD that veterinarians and NN experts strongly recommend against having markets IN these , which can be densely packed , difficult to keep clean , and pose a higher NN of viruses jumping from animals into NNS . She VBD the current NN - CD outbreak is an example of how JJ actions to mix together animals that were n't normally together can VB diseases to jump into JJ hosts . " The more we increase the interaction between NNS and animals , especially wildlife and especially livestock as well , or animals that are raised for food , the more likely we are to VB that kind of situation crop up , " she VBD . The NNP - CD outbreak is an example of the NN zoonotic diseases pose . Other well - VBN examples of zoonotic diseases that impact NNS are West Nile NN , HIV , Ebola , Zika , bird NN , Middle East respiratory syndrome , or MERS , Rift Valley fever , and sudden acute respiratory syndrome , or NN . On average , CD JJ infectious NN emerges in NNS every four months , according to the UNEP report , but not all are this severe . “ While it is very uncommon for diseases in animals to suddenly jump and become so transmissible between NNS as this NN did , the more we do that sort of thing , mixing animals together ... then the more likely that NN is VBG to be able to jump into NNS and become transmissible between NNS , " Justice - Allen VBD . With NN NN effects such as drought , increasing NNS and wildfires , Justice - Allen VBD animals will be forced to move to JJ areas . That MD lead to the same type of crowding and mixing seen in live animal markets and possibly expose animals to JJ diseases . FIGHTING NN : VBG robots to speed up testing , ASU hopes to open drive - thru NN testing VBG JJ NNS are increasing the habitat ranges of some insects that transmit diseases from CD organism to another , such as mosquitoes or ticks . NN is RB lengthening the season in which these insects can survive in some areas , leading to a boom in their population . In certain areas , these insects , RB VBN as NN vectors , are now able to survive NN - round where they were n't able to before . The increased range and abundance of vectors MD lead to more widespread NNS of mosquito - and tick - borne diseases such as malaria , West Nile NN , dengue fever , chikungunya , Zika , and Lyme NN , according to Heidi Brown , an ASU researcher who studies vector - borne diseases . Brown is CD of the researchers who works with the Arizona Department of NNP Services on a Building Resilience Against NNP Effects plan , which investigates the impacts of NN NN on JJ NN , projects future scenarios and suggests solutions to mitigate those effects . Arizona is CD of 16 NN grant recipients creating a BRACE plan as part of the CDC's NNP - Ready NNPS and Cities Initiative . " We have to be prepared for the VBN , which is increases in the stuff that we 're already seeing , but we RB have to be prepared for the unknown , which is novel introductions , " she VBD . In Arizona , VBN diseases such as West Nile NNP are likely to become a bigger concern , and MD spread into JJ areas of the NN outside of Maricopa County , Brown VBD . " Flagstaff does n't typically VB about or worry too much about West Nile NNP , and we do n't usually have a lot of NNS up there , but there 's NN that suggests that we might VB to start making sure that we 're watching for it , " she VBD . Arizona is RB worried about other mosquito - born diseases IN chikungunya and dengue fever , which are n't currently part of Arizona 's ecosystem but MD become permanently established in the future . Factors IN drought can RB VB vectors to cluster IN NN sources alongside of animals , leading to further mixing and further possibilities for JJ diseases spread in vectors . Another bridge between NNS and animal diseases is domestic animals , according to Bernard Bett , a scientist at International Livestock Research Institute . IN the NN , Bett VBD agriculture is increasingly encroaching on wild lands , bringing NNS and domestic animals closer to wild ones and disturbing the natural ecosystem . But domestic animals have been bred in such a NN that they lack the genetic diversity needed for NN resilience and can then pass the infection on to NNS . CD example is the bird NN , which moved from wild birds into domestic poultry before being passed to NNS . Demand for milk and meat " driven mainly by fast - growing populations of urban consumers in developing NNS , " is projected to double by 2050 , according to the UNEP report , meaning that the problem is likely to VB worse as agricultural demand expands . Urbanization RB can encroach on wild lands , Varsani VBD , and that means NNS are coming into increased contact with animals — creating another potential avenue for NN transmission . Increased zoonotic NN spread MD RB have devastating effects on animals , especially those already at NN from other NN NN effects . “ We have a number of endangered NNS here in Arizona which are kind of on the edge when it comes to being able to respond to JJ stressors , " Justice - Allen VBD . CD is the Mount Graham red squirrel , whose habitat was severely damaged by a wildfire in 2017 . While the population seems to be recovering , Justice - Allen VBD , " another stressor might tip them over the edge . " Other populations on the brink include the California condor , the black - footed ferret , and Arizona 's indigenous snakes and amphibians such as frogs . Some are already being challenged by NN . Black - footed ferrets feed on prairie dogs , but the plague , spread by fleas , can wipe out entire colonies of prairie dogs , decimating the ferrets ' food supply . This NN is n't native to North NNP , currently has a JJ incident rate in NNS and is curable in most NNS . But NNS of plague MD surge in coming NNS due to NN NN , according to Justice - Allen . " The dynamics of plague outbreaks is changing , or will VB , " she VBD . " This spring is setting us up for a pretty significant plague outbreak . These diseases , along with mosquito - and tick - borne diseases , are just a few VBN diseases that Arizona experts are monitoring . But there 's always the possibility for unknowns — for JJ diseases to show up unexpectedly — especially in tight living conditions . In more clustered spaces , Varsani VBD there 's a greater chance for an animal to become infected with CD JJ diseases at the same NN , opening the possibility for the birth of chimeras , or mash - ups , of CD JJ , related viruses . If CD viruses are infecting the same cell , when those viruses replicate , they can combine into a JJ hybrid NN that MD jump into JJ animals that were previously unaffected . " You mix components and what you ’re then doing is you ’re allowing for these viral genomes to evolve very rapidly and adapt to a JJ host , " he VBD . Varsani RB works to find and VB unknown viruses in remote areas , such as the polar regions . He has traveled to Antarctica nearly every NN since he RB visited about seven NNS ago , and VBD viruses he studies there MD have been RB for a while , but were only discovered recently . CD example is a circovirus that has only recently been noticed in penguins and that causes lethal feather loss . Viruses in the polar regions are just as abundant as they are in other parts of the NN , he VBD , and since the polar regions are expected to VB some of the most dramatic NNS due to NN NN , these regions and their viruses are crucial to understand for the future . As seen with the NN - CD outbreak , NNS for JJ diseases take NN to develop , as do tests to screen for them . Arizona and other NNS have come up with plans to deal with increased outbreaks and have vector - NN measures in place , but Brown acknowledged that it can be hard to prepare for JJ emerging diseases . " It 's a JJ process to be able to come up with tests and identify JJ pathogens , especially when they 're not the ones you 're VBN to looking for . ” The Arizona Game and Fish Department monitors for JJ NN emergences by surveilling animal populations and investigating animal deaths to ensure that the NN of death was n't an unknown NN , according to Justice - Allen . Bett VBD NN care officials can take other measures to ensure that there is a structured , strong NN NN in place with contingency plans for NN outbreaks and centers where patients can be isolated or receive supportive treatment . “ I wonder to what extent the U.S. anticipated this spread . If you have good anticipation , that ’s a good JJ line of defense , " Bett VBD . RB with further NN of NN effects on NN , there can be unpredicted challenges in trying to anticipate and address JJ diseases , VBD Ben Beard , the deputy director of the CDC ’s Division of Vector - Borne Diseases in Fort Collins , Colorado . " While JJ term trends in NN NN can be modeled , specific NN events or disasters such as hurricanes , floods , or fires are very difficult to predict and MD have a JJ impact on NN outbreaks , " he wrote in an email to The Republic . To prepare and respond to future outbreaks , he VBD , a strong JJ NN framework that prioritizes JJ NN surveillance , NN and local preparedness , and JJ - term research MD be necessary . In addition to being more conscious of how NNS affect the environment and existing ecosystems , Varsani VBD identifying and understanding the viruses present in the NN currently can VB society better prepare to VB them . This is no JJ feat , considering that viruses are among the most abundant entities on the NN . " Viruses are understudied , " he VBD . “ We have no idea what the next entity will be , nobody expected this outbreak to take place and it's now consumed most of the NN in a very short period . ” Amanda Morris covers all things bioscience , which includes NN care , technology , JJ research and the environment . text: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration released its 2019 Arctic Report Card on Tuesday , and folks , the results are n’t great . The report details a rapidly changing Arctic environment featuring melting NN , a greener landscape , and , alarmingly , NN - gas NNS on par with some JJ nations . The Arctic MD be releasing upwards of 600 CD tons of net NN per NN , the report finds , potentially putting the region alongside Mexico , Canada , and South Korea as CD of the NN ’s largest contributors to atmospheric CO2 . Though the NN emitted from such industrialized nations is the result of burning fossil fuels , the hundreds of millions of metric tons pumping out of the Arctic is the result of thawing permafrost . Permafrost being permafrost , it takes more than the seasons changing for it to actually melt it . The increasingly rapid thawing of frozen Arctic NN is the result of NN NN , and the NOAA ’s report card reveals that NNS are continuing to rise in the NN ’s nether - regions , which are n’t as icy as they VBD to be . In August , for instance , the average NN NN NNS in several highlighted Arctic bodies of NN were 1 - 7 degrees Celsius warmer than the average from 1982 - 2010 . Just as frightening : the average land NN NN north of 60 degrees N was the second - warmest since 1900 . It ’s not just permafrost that rising NNS are affecting . The report RB VBD : • None The Greenland NNP Sheet is losing 267 CD metric tons of NN per NN . • None CD of the five lowest months for North JJ Arctic snow cover in the 53 NNS records have been kept occurred this summer . • None NNP NN extent this summer was tied for the second - lowest since satellite imagery recorded coverage in 1979 . NN NN extent in the winter was RB second - lowest , narrowly falling short of the lowest - ever total , which occurred in …2018 . These NNS are threatening indigenous Arctic communities and Arctic wildlife directly , as well as the rest of the NN , on a profound scale . The deteriorating Greenland NNP Sheet is causing the JJ NN level to rise 0.7 millimeters per NN , and Arctic NN NNS are helping cook the NN at a rate that will soon be irreversible unless dramatic steps are taken . The NN for urgent NN was stressed Wednesday by teenage NN activist Greta Thunberg , who spoke to delegates at a NNP Nations NN summit in Madrid . “ Our leaders are not behaving as though we were in an emergency , ” VBD Thunberg , who the same day was named NNP magazine ’s Person of NNP . “ If there ’s a NN standing in the middle of the road and cars are coming at full speed , you do n’t look away because it is too uncomfortable . You immediately run out and rescue that NN . And without that sense of urgency , how can we , the NNS , understand that we are facing a real NN . ” Some governing bodies are at least trying . The European Commission on Wednesday revealed plans for a European Green Deal that MD reimagine the continent ’s economy in accordance with the NN NN . Meanwhile , the NN of the NN ’s second - largest NN emitter is dismantling efforts to fight the problem and struggling to RB feign concern . “ NN NN is very important to me , ” NNP NNP managed last week in London despite his penchant for slashing JJ regulations . “ I ’ve done JJ JJ impact statements over my NN and I VBP very strongly in very , very crystal clear , clean NN and clean air . That ’s a JJ part of NN NN . ” This post has been updated .

text: The NNP - CD lockdown has cut NN NN NNS - for now . But some governments VBP to VB further by harnessing their JJ recovery plans to boost low - NN industries . Their slogan is " Build Back Better " , but can they succeed ? I 've just had a light bulb moment . The feisty little wren chirping loudly in the matted ivy outside my back door is telling us something important about JJ NN NN . That 's because , intertwined with the melodious notes of a robin , I can actually hear its song clearly . Normally , both birds are muffled by the insistent rumble of traffic , but the din has been all but extinguished in the peace of lockdown . The drop in traffic is a major contributor to the fall in NN - NN CO2 NNS we 've witnessed globally . Before the NNP - CD NN , we accepted the dominance of traffic noise as an inevitable consequence of city living . Now , we have sampled an alternative urban ambience . Governments currently face a stark choice : bail out polluting businesses , VBG that as leverage to impose environmentally - minded reforms , or let them return to their NN - intensive activities as an JJ quick fix . But JJ members of the NN have little desire to return to the NN of affairs before lockdown . In a poll , a fifth of members of the motoring group the AA , VBD they MD work more from home in future . This has implications for the UK NN 's £ 28bn road - building programme which assumes that traffic will rise by 1 % per NN - a conjecture that now looks unlikely . The stay - at - home trend will be offset somewhat by nervous JJ transport NNS shunning trains for fear of infection , and by JJ - distance commuters who might decide that if they only VBP to visit the office three days a week , they 'll buy a home RB further away . The AA , which for NNS was seen as the voice of motorists , has asked the NN to VB again about its £ 28bn road expansion . Its NN , Edmund King , has suggested the NN MD be better spent on improving broadband Another likely winner from the NN is the movement fighting to turn city streets over to pedestrians and cyclists . This has already happened in places IN Paris , which is rolling out 650 km of " corona cycle - ways " , and Milan , which has a programme to prioritise pedestrians and cyclists . The determination to seize the moment for JJ NN stretches further than the transport sector . The UK is CD of several nations looking to reboot its JJ strategy by calling in favours from private industry . After all , it was NN which bailed out employers when the crunch came in March . The catchphrase is " Build Back Better " . But it MD seem to face a direct challenge in the shape of NNP and the US . The economies of both these superpowers have been savaged by the effects of NN . They are desperate to VB back to pre-virus levels of output , so their leaders MD VB the surest means of doing so is through tried and trusted NN NN fossil fuels . For those seeking a greener NN out of the NNP - CD slump , renewable NN will VB , along with electric vehicle charging points and broadband . Frans Timmermans , vice NN of the European Commission , is on the same track . He is leading work on a Green Deal to make the EU 's economy sustainable and VBZ that not a single Euro should be spent propping up old , dirty industries . All NNP - CD recovery investment should VB towards commerce that either helps reduce NN NNS or promotes digital business , he insists . But some MEPs from parties on the NN warn that the NN will have " far - reaching " JJ and JJ consequences . They insist the EU must scale back its pre-crisis NN ambitions . That 's led some governments , IN Germany and the UK , to offer hand - outs to polluting industries without imposing green conditions . In the UK , the issue is causing contortions among politicians torn between saving existing jobs and conserving the NN . MPs from the Liberal Democrats - thought of as CD of the " greenest " UK parties - have joined other parliamentarians in demanding a conditional rescue for the airline industry . They VBP that if ministers do n't step in , tens of thousands of jobs will be lost . But the firms should promise to off - set their NNS by , for example , planting trees . Off - setting is hugely contentious . Doug Parr , chief scientist at Greenpeace , argues : " Any NN bailout should focus on workers , not the industry itself . " It should be conditional on the industry agreeing to shrink until - if ever - low - NN technology is available - which is n't now . " That begs a question : which industries should qualify for support ? Should cash VB exclusively to self - evidently green sectors IN solar NN - or to dirty firms trying to clean up ? Take the fossil fuel firms that pay our pension dividends by drilling for the stuff that 's over - heating the NN . The UK's oil and gas industry warns that 30,000 jobs MD be lost because of the NN and the current low oil NN . But why MD governments support a commodity that 's fuelling the NN NN , which is judged by the UN to be deeper than the NNP - CD NN ? Perhaps it 's not that simple . Lord Stern , the JJ Treasury chief who 's now a NN expert , VBD me each firm should be judged on its trajectory , not on its current NN . It seems that if JJ - induced JJ NN continues on its current trajectory , the NN 's beer supply will dry up . You read that RB : If JJ - induced JJ NN continues on its current trajectory , the NN 's beer supply will dry up . Forget the other aspects of JJ NN : devastating and more frequent hurricanes ; hotter - than - normal summers ; longer droughts ; wildfires ; rising NN levels . We MD run out of beer , NNS ! Researchers , in a NN published Oct. 15 , 2018 , in the journal Nature Plants , ran the numbers and concluded that excessive and prolonged heat waves and droughts will ravage the NN 's barley supply . As any imbiber of beer will tell you , barley is the main ingredient in any good pint . As these fields of taste and wonder disappear , the laws of supply and demand will muscle in . Beer prices will surge , which means only the well - heeled will be able to afford a frosty mug of brew . No trickle - down economics here . The hoi polis — you , me and our friends — will be left high and dry . Ireland MD VB a 193 percent NN increase , depending on the severity of conditions . " The NN is facing JJ NN - threatening impacts of NN NN , so NNS having to spend a bit more to drink beer MD seem trivial by comparison , " co-author Steven Davis , UCI associate professor of NNP NN NN VBD in a statement . " But there is definitely a cross-cultural appeal to beer , and not having a cool pint at the end of an increasingly common hot day just adds insult to injury . If their models are accurate , the regions of the NN where barley grows , especially the prairies of Canada , the northern Great Plains of the NNP NNPS , and parts of Europe , Asia and Australia , will VB hotter and drier , causing crop yields to decline 3 to 17 percent . RB modest NN will lead to more drought and heat in these areas , the NNS VBP . As a result , beer prices will VB up in beer - loving NNS , including Belgium , Canada , Denmark and Poland . If you love spending NN chugging in Ireland , you will VB an extra $ 20 to buy a six - pack . Moreover , NNS in poorer NNS will VB beer consumption VB down . Argentina , the researchers VBD , will VB a 32 percent decrease in beer drinking . As for the NNP NNPS , you 'll VB less keggers and beer pong , not to mention the occasional funnel . " Our results show that in the most severe NN events , the supply of beer MD decline by about 16 percent in NNS when droughts and heat waves strike , " Davis VBD . " That 's comparable to all beer consumption in the U.S. Future NN and pricing conditions MD put beer out of reach for hundreds of millions of NNS IN the NN . " What MD Ben Franklin VB ?

Over the course of the NN , values are higher in Northern Hemisphere winter and lower in summer . The dark red line shows the annual trend , calculated as a 12 - month rolling average . According to the NN of the NNP in 2018 report from NOAA and the NNP Meteorological Society , JJ atmospheric NN dioxide was 407.4 ± 0.1 ppm in 2018 , a JJ record high . That is an increase of 2.5 ± 0.1 ppm from 2017 , similar to the increase of 2.2 ± 0.1 ppm between CD and 2017 . In the 1960s , the JJ growth rate of atmospheric NN dioxide was roughly 0.6 ± 0.1 ppm per NN . Over the past decade , however , the growth rate has been closer to 2.3 ppm per NN . The annual rate of increase in atmospheric NN dioxide over the past 60 NNS is about 100 times faster than previous natural increases , such as those that occurred at the end of the last NN age 11,000 - 17,000 NNS ago . NN dioxide is a NN gas : a gas that absorbs and radiates heat . Warmed by sunlight , NNP ’s land and ocean surfaces continuously radiate thermal infrared NN ( heat ) . Unlike oxygen or nitrogen ( which make up most of our atmosphere ) , NN gases absorb that heat and release it gradually over NN , IN bricks in a fireplace after the fire goes out . Without this natural NN effect , NNP ’s average annual NN MD be below freezing instead of close to 60 °F . But increases in NN gases have tipped the NNP 's NN budget out of balance , trapping additional heat and raising NNP 's average NN . NN dioxide is the most important of NNP ’s RB - lived NN gases . It absorbs less heat per molecule than the NN gases methane or nitrous oxide , but it ’s more abundant and it stays in the atmosphere much longer . And while NN dioxide is less abundant and less powerful than NN vapor on a molecule per molecule basis , it absorbs wavelengths of thermal NN that NN vapor does not , which means it adds to the NN effect in a unique NN . Increases in atmospheric NN dioxide are responsible for about CD - thirds of the total NN imbalance that is causing NNP 's NN to rise . Another reason NN dioxide is important in the NNP NN is that it dissolves into the ocean IN the fizz in a can of soda . It reacts with NN molecules , producing carbonic acid and lowering the ocean 's pH . Since the start of the Industrial Revolution , the pH of the ocean 's NN waters has dropped from 8.21 to 8.10 . This drop in pH is called ocean acidification . A drop of 0.1 MD not seem IN a lot , but the pH scale is logarithmic ; a 1 - unit drop in pH means a tenfold increase in acidity . A NN of 0.1 means a roughly 30 % increase in acidity . Increasing acidity interferes with the ability of marine NN to extract calcium from the NN to build their shells and skeletons . Natural increases in NN dioxide concentrations have periodically warmed NNP ’s NN during NN age cycles over the past CD NNS or more . The warm episodes ( interglacials ) began with a JJ increase in sunlight due to a tiny wobble in NNP ’s axis of rotation or in the path of its orbit IN the NNP . That little bit of extra sunlight caused a little bit of NN . As the oceans warmed , they outgassed NN dioxide — IN a can of soda VBG JJ in the heat of a summer day . The extra NN dioxide in the atmosphere amplified the initial NN . VBN on air bubbles trapped in mile - thick NN cores ( and other paleoclimate NN ) , we VBP that during the NN age cycles of the past CD NNS or so , NN dioxide never exceeded 300 ppm . Before the Industrial Revolution started in the mid-1700s , the JJ average amount of NN dioxide was about 280 ppm . By the NN continuous observations began at Mauna Loa Volcanic Observatory in 1958 , JJ atmospheric NN dioxide was already 315 ppm . On NNP 9 , 2013 , the daily average NN dioxide measured at Mauna Loa surpassed 400 ppm for the JJ NN on record . Less than CD NNS later , in 2015 , the JJ amount went over 400 ppm for the JJ NN . If JJ NN demand continues to grow and to be met mostly with fossil fuels , atmospheric NN dioxide is projected to exceed 900 ppm by the end of this century . Collins , M. , R. Knutti , J. text: Melbourne , 25 June 2012 : Australian infectious NN therapy and NN development NN BioDiem Ltd ( ASX : BDM ) announced today the signing of a licensing agreement with Australian National NNP ( ANU ) . This agreement is for an exclusive JJ license to commercialise a novel NN technology from the John Curtin School of NNP Research at ANU . Dengue Fever is the lead indication , but the technology MD RB facilitate the design of NNS against a number of other infectious diseases including Murray River encephalitis and Japanese encephalitis . The increasing incidence of mosquito - borne NN is a major NN concern worldwide as NN NN expands the range of the carrier mosquitoes , exposing larger JJ populations . The agreement includes provision for BioDiem to sublicense the technology . Industry standard royalties apply , but apart from a JJ contribution towards patent registration costs there is no up - front outlay for BioDiem . The agreement follows the signing of a term sheet announced to the ASX on 6 June 2012 . Dengue Fever is a NN caused by a mosquito - borne NN that affects between 50 and 100 CD NNS a NN , and according to the NNP NNP Organization the incidence is increasing significantly . Although only a JJ percentage of NNS are fatal , non-fatal NNS can be extremely debilitating . Dengue Fever currently has no existing NN , and NN methods currently include attempts to address mosquito populations with varying effectiveness . The technology is complementary to the BioDiem portfolio as well as the NN 's strategic focus on NNS and therapies for infectious diseases and related cancers . " We are delighted to announce the completion of this licensing agreement , which sees BioDiem 's commercial expertise in the area of NNS fittingly partnered with the exciting research developed by ANU . Our focus on infectious diseases is an excellent fit for this JJ technology which has strong potential as an asset for outlicensing " VBD BioDiem CEO Julie Phillips . BioDiem 's current strategy for the ANU technology includes leveraging the NN 's JJ partnering network to deliver an outlicensing partner for development of the technology , providing an opportunity to secure a royalties stream without significant development costs on the part of BioDiem . BioDiem is an ASX - listed NN VBN in Melbourne with an international focus on discovering , developing and commercialising NN - class research and technology targeting cancers and infectious diseases . BioDiem 's core technologies include the Live Attenuated Influenza NNP ( LAIV ) , the SAVINE platform and the BDM - I antimicrobial compound . The LAIV influenza NN is an intranasal NN to prevent infection from seasonal and NN influenza . The LAIV influenza NN can be produced VBG both egg - VBN and cell - VBN manufacturing methods . The cell - VBN LAIV NN has completed a Phase II clinical trial in Europe . The egg - VBN LAIV NN technology is licensed to the NNP NNP Organization as part of the NNP NNP Influenza NNP Plan to Increase NNP Supply . The LAIV influenza NN is marketed as Nasovac™ in India by the Serum Institute of India , and has been licensed to NNP - VBN Changchun BCHT Biotechnology Co . The LAIV NN was in - licensed from the Institute of Experimental Medicine in St Petersburg , NNP where it has been VBN for over a decade in JJ millions of NNS - NNS , adults and the elderly . The LAIV is administered by nasal spray and induces a rapid JJ response in the mucosal lining of the nose and pharynx . The LAIV is RB being developed as a viral vector for making novel non-influenza NNS for JJ diseases including cancers . Viruses have the ability to generate proteins prolifically and can be programmed to produce NN - specific proteins . As part of a NN , NN - specific proteins can VB generate a beneficial JJ response . SAVINE ( patented Scrambled Antigen NNP ) is a platform technology for the design of antigens for incorporation into NNS targeting an JJ response to a range of JJ diseases . SAVINE antigens are encoded as synthetic genes which , together with a delivery technology such as BioDiem 's LAIV - VBN NN vector technology , can be VBN to develop novel NNS . BDM - I is a synthetic compound targeted at the treatment of serious JJ infections . BDM - I is in the preclinical stage with outlicensing as the intended outcome . BDM - I is active against a range of pathogenic micro-organisms including gram - positive and gram - negative bacteria , fungi and protozoa . Key patents have been filed IN BDM - I 's antimicrobial activity , including for activity against Plasmodium falciparum , responsible for causing the most commonly severe form of malaria , and Trichomonas vaginalis , the protozoan responsible for causing a common sexually transmitted NN named trichomoniasis . BioDiem is RB developing BDM-E , a tetra peptide synthetic compound , as a treatment for ophthalmic disorders . The US Food & Drug Administration ( USFDA ) has granted Orphan Drug designation to BDM-E for the treatment of retinitis pigmentosa , a serious degenerative NN of the retina . BioDiem 's research is ongoing in partnership with internationally recognised laboratories . For additional NN , please visit www.biodiem.com

text: In addition to the already existing pressure on our freshwater resources , NN NN MD further decrease NN availability . In this NN , projections of future NN resources , due to NN NN , land use NN and NNS in NN consumption have been assessed VBG JRC ’s LISFLOOD NN resources model . The results presented are VBN on 11 NN models which project current and future NN under CD Representative Concentration Pathways ( RCPs ) : RCP4.5 and RCP 8.5 emission scenario . RCP4.5 MD be viewed as a moderate - NNS - mitigation - policy scenario and RCP8.5 as a high - end NNS scenario . A 30 - NN window IN the NN that JJ NN reaches 1.5 oC , 2 oC and 3 oC above preindustrial NN has been analysed and compared to the 1981 - 2010 NN NN window ( baseline ) . The 1.5 °C and 2 °C NN scenarios are explicitly considered in the Paris Agreement , while a 3 °C JJ NN is a scenario that MD be expected by the end of the 21st century if adequate mitigation strategies are not taken . RB , we performed future projections without socio-economic developments to show the effect of NN NN only . Next , an integrated assessment is performed including future NNS in land use , NN demand and population . This allows us to disentangle the effects of NN and socio-economic NNS . In general , the NN projections reveal a typically North - South pattern across Europe for NN availability . Overall , Southern European NNS are projected to face decreasing NN availability , particularly Spain , Portugal , Greece , Cyprus , Malta , Italy and Turkey . Central and Northern European NNS show an increasing annual NN availability .

text: John Quincy Adams was the sixth NN of the NNP NNPS . He was RB the eldest son of NNP John Adams , the second U.S. NN . John Quincy Adams was the eldest son of NNP John Adams and the sixth NN of the NNP NNPS . In his pre-presidential NNS , Adams was CD of NNP 's greatest diplomats ( formulating , among other things , what became the Monroe Doctrine ) ; in his post - presidential NNS , he conducted a consistent and often dramatic fight against the expansion of slavery . Though full of promise , his presidential NNS were difficult . He died in 1848 in NNP , D.C . Though he was CD of few Americans to be so prepared to serve as NN of the NNP NNPS , John Quincy Adams 's best NNS of service came before and after his NN in the White NNP . Born on July 11 , 1767 , in Braintree , Massachusetts , John Quincy was the son of John Adams , a prodigy of the NNP Revolution who MD become the second U.S. NN just before his John Quincy 's 30th birthday , and his wife , future JJ lady Abigail Adams . As a NN , Adams witnessed firsthand the birth of the nation . From the family farm , he and his mother watched the Battle of Bunker Hill in 1775 . At age CD , he traveled to France with his father , who was securing aid during the Revolution . By age 14 , Adams was receiving " on - the - job " training in the diplomatic corps and VBG to school . In 1781 , he accompanied diplomat Francis Dana to NNP , serving as his secretary and translator . In 1783 , he traveled to Paris to serve as secretary to his father , negotiating the Treaty of Paris . During this NN , Adams attended schools in Europe and became fluent in French , Dutch and German . Returning home in 1785 , he entered Harvard College and graduated in 1787 . In 1790 , Adams became a practicing attorney in Boston . As tensions mounted between Britain and France , he supported NNP George NNP 's neutrality policy of 1793 . NNP NNP appreciated young Adams 's support so much that he appointed him U.S. minister to Holland . When his father was elected NN in 1797 , he appointed his son U.S. minister to Prussia . On the NN to his post , Adams traveled to England to wed Louisa Catherine Johnson , the daughter of Joshua Johnson , the JJ U.S. consul to Great Britain . After his father lost his bid for a second term in 1800 , he recalled his son from Prussia . In 1802 , Adams was elected to the Massachusetts legislature , and CD NN later , he was elected the U.S. Senate . IN his father , Adams was considered a member of the Federalist Party , but in truth , he was never a strict party NN . During his NN in the Senate , he supported the Louisiana Purchase and NNP Thomas Jefferson 's Embargo Act—actions that made him very unpopular with other Federalists . In June 1808 , Adams broke with the Federalists , resigned from his Senate seat and became a Democratic - Republican . Adams returned to the diplomatic corps in 1809 , when NNP James Madison appointed him the JJ officially recognized minister to NNP ( Francis Dana was never officially accepted as a U.S. ambassador by the Russian NN ) . In 1814 , Adams was recalled from NNP to serve as chief negotiator for the U.S. NN during the Treaty of Ghent , settling the NNP of 1812 . The following NN , Adams served as minister to England , a position his father had held 30 NNS earlier . In a post he was most suited for , Adams served as secretary of NN in NNP James Monroe 's administration from 1817 to 1825 . During this NN , he negotiated the Adams - Onis Treaty , acquiring Florida for the NNP NNPS . He RB helped negotiate the Treaty of 1818 , settling the JJ - standing border dispute between Britain and the NNP NNPS over the Oregon Country , and initiating improved relations between Great Britain and its JJ colonies . By age 50 , Adams had amassed a very impressive record of JJ service , but perhaps his most notable and enduring achievement was the Monroe Doctrine . After the Napoleonic wars had ended , several Latin JJ colonies of Spain rose up and declared independence . A defining moment for the NNP NNPS , Adams crafted the Monroe Doctrine , which stated the NNP NNPS MD resist any European country 's efforts to thwart independence movements in Latin NNP ; the doctrine , RB introduced in 1823 , served to justify U.S. intervention in Latin NNP throughout the late 19th and most of the 20th centuries . By 1824 , Adams was well - positioned to be the next NN of the NNP NNPS . However , the JJ NN had changed the NN presidents were elected at the NN ; only the Democratic - Republican Party was viable and five candidates emerged , each representing JJ sections of the country . Running against Adams were Southerners John C. Calhoun and William Crawford , and Westerners Henry Clay and Andrew Jackson . In addition , by the 1824 NN , 18 of 24 NNS had moved to choose electors to the Electoral College by popular vote instead of to NN legislatures . In the Electoral College vote , no CD candidate had a clear majority and , subsequently , the NN was sent to the NNP of Representatives . Clay threw his support to Adams , who was elected on the JJ ballot . Adams 's victory shocked Jackson , who had won the popular vote and fully expected to be NN . When Adams later appointed Clay secretary of NN , Jackson Democrats cried " corrupt bargain , " and were enraged at the seemingly quid pro quo arrangement . Adams entered the presidency with several debilitating JJ liabilities . He possessed the temperament of his father : Aloof , stubborn and ferociously independent in his convictions . As NN , Adams failed to develop the JJ relationships needed — RB among members of his own party — to effect significant NN . It did n't VB that his JJ opponents were set on making him a CD - term NN . In his JJ NN in office , Adams proposed several far - sighted programs that he felt MD promote NN , as well as encourage a spirit of enterprise and invention in the NNP NNPS ; these goals included building a network of highways and canals to link the JJ sections of the country , setting aside JJ lands for conservation , surveying the entire U.S. coast and building astronomical observatories . Adams RB saw the NN for practical solutions to universal problems , thusly calling for the establishment of a uniform NN of weights and measures and improving the patent NN . While these MD have been admirable goals for an aspiring nation , they were considered overambitious and unrealistic for the NNP NNPS in the 1820s . Adams 's proposals were met with scorn and derision by JJ opponents ; critics charged that the NN 's policies MD enlarge the powers and influence of the federal NN at the expense of the NN and local governments , and some accused Adams of promoting programs to enhance the elite and neglect the common NNS . In the midterm NN of 1826 , Jacksonian opponents won majorities in both Houses of Congress . As a result , JJ of Adams 's initiatives either failed to pass legislation or were woefully underfunded . The NN of 1828 was an especially bitter and personal affair . As was the tradition , neither candidate personally campaigned , but supporters conducted ruthless attacks on the opposing candidates . The campaign reached a low point when the press accused Jackson 's wife , Rachel , of bigamy . Adams lost the NN by a decisive margin , and he left NNP without attending Jackson 's inauguration . In 1830 , he ran for and won a seat in the U.S. NNP of Representatives , once again distinguishing himself as a statesman of the JJ order . In 1841 , he argued in front of the Supreme NNP on behalf of escaped African slaves in the famous Amistad NN , and won the release of the captives . During the event , Adams suddenly collapsed , suffering from a massive cerebral hemorrhage . He was taken to the Speaker 's Room in the Capitol Building , where he died CD days later , on February 23 , 1848 .

text: NN NN - what are we doing ? The council adopted a NNP NNP Strategy in April 2014 , which was refreshed in 2017 to bring it up to speed with other local and national developments in the NN NN agenda . It included the adoption of national targets IN NN emission reductions and the use of renewable NN . We are now developing a draft NNP NNP and Air Quality Strategy that we plan to publish for consultation later in 2020 . This will outline the steps that we ’ll be taking to tackle the issue and reduce our impact on the environment . The drive to become a NN neutral borough by 2030 starts now and we have started work to set out the steps we as a council can take and how we can work together as a borough . In December 2019 , we held a NN NN summit to bring together ideas with partners . View a copy of the presentation and the Outcomes Report . Already we have : • Installed solar panels on the roof of several of our council buildings . • Improved the NN performance of the council ’s Deanes and Parklands buildings • Set up a group of Environment Champions to promote sustainable practices among staff . • Installed a fresh air cooling NN at the Civic Offices , as well as being environmentally - friendly , the initiative will generate a saving of £ 9,500 per NN . • Reduced the distances our bin trucks travel by rebalancing the rounds , with a monthly NN saving of 3.8 % per month . With partners , we have : • Adopted a transport strategy with a focus on encouraging more sustainable transport including cycling and walking . • Given out loans and grants to improve insulation and install renewable NN sources . • Supported residents to apply for NN funding for NN efficient boilers . We are working on our next steps looking at greener ways of delivering council services . Here are just a few of the projects we are working on : • With advice from the NNP Savings Trust we are exploring greater use of electric vehicles . • Updating our Local Plan to ensure tougher standards associated with NN NN and NNS . • Reviewing the NN efficiency of our accommodation and our staff and councillors ’ travel . • Delivering 3,500 homes at Manydown VBG the Garden Towns ’ principle .

text: CD Nation is led by Pauline Hanson , who during the 1990s was a controversial figure in Australian politics for her views on immigration and Indigenous Australians . His previous writing indicates that he believes a shadowy cabal of bankers is controlling NN affairs . He VBZ the NNP Nations is VBG NN NN to lay the foundations for an unelected JJ NN . Malcolm Roberts won a Queensland Senate seat as member of the anti-immigration NNP Nation party in recent elections . The BBC has asked Mr Roberts for an interview and submitted questions to him by email , but has not received a reply . He called for an investigation into Australia ’s Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation ( CSIRO ) over its handling of NN NN NN . When asked if he still believed the UN was trying to impose a worldwide NN through NN NN policy , Mr Roberts answered : “ Definitely ” . In 2011 , Mr Roberts wrote a letter to then Australian Prime Minister Julia Gillard demanding to be exempted from the country ’s NN tax . The letter , addressed to “ The Woman , Julia - Eileen : Gillard ” , contained a 28 - point affidavit that sought to establish Mr Roberts ’ exemption from the NN to obey the Australian NN . He referred to himself as “ Malcolm - Ieuan : Roberts . , the living soul ” , and identified himself as the “ beneficiary , administrator ” for a corporate entity called MALCOLM IEUAN ROBERTS . The punctuation and language is consistent with a style of language VBN by the so - called sovereign citizen movement , which sees governments as illegitimate and attempts to assert the rights of individuals to ignore laws and taxes . The use of unusual grammar and punctuation by sovereign citizens is intended to establish independence from the NN ’s legal NN . Mr Roberts RB wrote a report in 2013 entitled CSRIOh ! : NN of Deception , Or JJ Step to Freedom ? that detailed his rejection of man-made JJ NN . “ The UN IPCC ’s unfounded core claim about JJ CO2 is part of UN Agenda 21 campaign for JJ governance , ” the report VBD . It RB lists Holocaust denier and NN theorist Eustace Mullins as a primary reference . Mr Roberts has been criticised in the past by prominent Australian NN sceptic Andrew Bolt , who VBD his NNS on banking families “ smacks too much of the Jewish NN NN theorising I ’ve always loathed ” . But in the report Mr Roberts writes that those who “ falsely smear or imply those raising the topic [ of the international banking scam ] as anti-Jewish … is an unfounded furphy [ an untruth ] designed to distract . text: NNS often confuse the concepts of JJ NN and NN NN , and it does n’t VB that NN NNS often substitute CD for the other in TV , newspaper , and JJ NN reporting . This is somewhat understandable since the CD concepts overlap a great deal . In fact , there is a causal relationship between the CD . However , there are some subtle and some not - so - subtle differences between JJ NN and NN NN . The phrase JJ NN is VBN by NNS to mean a JJ - term increase in NNP ’s average air NN . It can refer specifically to such NN that is due to the influence of rising concentrations of NN gases in the atmosphere . NNP ’s NN gets most of its heat from the NN associated with the NNP ’s rays , which strike the NN ’s NN during the day . At night most of this NN is radiated back into NN . NN gases ( such as NN dioxide , methane , nitrous oxides , and chlorofluorocarbons [ CFCs ] ) absorb infrared radiation ( net heat NN ) emitted from NNP ’s NN and radiate it back to the NN , thus contributing to the NN effect . Though the recent rise in NN gases in the atmosphere is arguably the main factor affecting JJ NN , other factors are involved ( such as variations in NNP ’s orbit , the angle of the NN ’s axis , and variations in the NNP ’s NN output ) . Nevertheless , as higher concentrations of NN gases allow NNP ’s atmosphere to hold on to greater amounts of heat that MD normally escape into NN at night , NNP ’s average NN rises . NN NN is a bit JJ . Before we look into what NN NN is , it MD be helpful to VB a bit about NN with respect to NN . NN , which is often confused with NN , is the set of conditions in the atmosphere in CD location for a limited period of NN , such as throughout the day , at night , or at any particular point during the day . NN , on the other hand , is the average condition of the atmosphere in a given location over a JJ period of NN , such as 30 NNS or more . Thus , NN NN is a longer - term NN in the average condition of the atmosphere . JJ beings most certainly contribute to NN NN by adding NN gases to the atmosphere , but this is only part of the equation . NNP ’s NN can VB over NN not only because of NNS in the atmosphere but RB because of interactions between the atmosphere and various geologic , chemical , biological , and geographic factors . For example , regional climates ( as well as NNP ’s JJ NN ) can VB in response to a sustained period of heavy volcanic activity . Much of that activity is related in turn to the movement of NNP ’s tectonic plates , which drives the continents across the NN of the NN . Over hundreds of thousands to millions of NNS , the continents collide with other continents or break apart , changing the paths of ocean currents and local winds . This affects the transport of heat from the tropics to the poles . NNP ’s JJ NN has RB changed in response to drastic NNS in atmospheric chemistry — notably the rise in oxygen concentrations billions of NNS ago when plants , algae , and other forms of NN capable of photosynthesis began to spread across the NN . As the NN continues to come to grips with how JJ activities influence NNP ’s NN , the tangible effects of NN NN that is caused by JJ NN — such as melting glaciers and NN caps , rising NN levels , and NNS in seasonal NN and rainfall patterns — are becoming the focus . With such disruptions becoming more and more apparent , JJ NNS are discussing them increasingly in terms of real JJ - term climatic NNS rather than simply remarking about NNP ’s average NN . Consequently , NN NN can RB refer to the NN - and - effect relationship between JJ NN and NN NN . That is , it can refer to a NN in the average condition of the atmosphere brought on by JJ NN .

text: It turns out that the opposite of dystopia is not utopia , but rather a goofily charming Australian actor armed with a camera and a mission . With his JJ documentary “ 2040 , ” writer - director Damon Gameau set out to create a letter from the future , a self - described “ exercise in fact - VBN dreaming , ” for his 4 - NN - old daughter Velvet . His goal : present Velvet and her generation a positive path for battling NN NN utilizing only solutions that are presently available . Gameau initiated this vision of the future by asking 100 NNS from IN the NN what they MD VB 2040 to look IN . He was startled by how aware the kids ( ages 6 - 11 ) are of the challenges the NN is facing and weaves their voices into the film as an unjaded chorus of boundless potential ( “ Clean NN ! ” “ End deforestation ! ” “ Rocket boots ! ” “ National hot dog day ! ” ) . Turning to experts in various fields , Gameau learns about solar - powered microgrids , localized economies , electric self - driving cars , urban food farms , regenerative agriculture , marine permaculture , resource awareness and increased educational opportunities for girls ( perhaps the most surprising element presented ) . Every solution is then dramatized as to how it might affect the NN of a 20 - something Velvet . The effect is inspiring and empowering . Fanciful animation , graphics and special effects , abetted by Gameau ’s down under whimsy , make the film as entertaining as it is educational . Powered by unbridled optimism , Gameau defies skeptics by doing his homework and bringing receipts . Working on the film in 2019 , Gameau had no idea what 2020 MD look IN . Strangely or not , the massive uncertainty of the present only reenforces the pragmatic arguments of “ 2040 . ” The status quo is unsustainable , and Gameau illustrates that transformative NN is not only necessary , but possible .

text: How To Discuss “ NN NN ” With A ‘ Woke ’ Teenager After our daughter of fifteen NNS of age was moved to tears by the speech of Greta Thunberg at the UN the other day , she became angry with our generation “ who had been doing nothing for thirty NNS . ” So , we decided to VB her prevent what the girl on TV announced of “ massive eradication and the disappearance of entire ecosystems . ” We are now committed to give our daughter a future again , by doing our part to VB cool the NN four degrees . From now on she will VB to school on a bicycle , because driving her by car costs fuel , and fuel puts NNS into the atmosphere . Of course it will be winter soon and then she will VB to VB by bus , but cycling through the freezing builds resilience . Of course , she is now asking for an electric bicycle , but we have shown her the devastation caused to the areas of the NN as a result of mining for the extraction of Lithium and other minerals VBN to make batteries for electric bicycles , so she will be pedaling , or walking . Which will not harm her , or the NN . We VBD to cycle and walk to school too . Since the girl on TV demanded “ we VBP to VB rid of our dependency on fossil fuels ” and our daughter agreed with her , we have disconnected the heat vent in her room . The NN is now dropping to twelve degrees in the evening , and will drop below freezing in the winter , we have promised to buy her an extra sweater , hat , tights , gloves and a blanket . For the same reason we have decided that from now on she only takes a cold shower . She will wash her clothes by hand , with a wooden washboard , because the washing machine is simply a NN consumer and since the dryer uses natural gas , she will hang her clothes on the clothes line to dry , just IN my NNS and grandparents VBD to do . Speaking of clothes , the ones that she currently has are all synthetic , so made from petroleum . Therefore on Monday , we will bring all her designer clothing to the secondhand shop . We have VBN an eco store where the only clothing they sell is made from undyed and unbleached linen and jute . RB ca n’t have clothes made on wool , because the NNS from farting sheep are supposedly causing bad NN . It should n’t matter that it looks good on her , or that she is VBG to be laughed at , dressing in colorless , bland clothes and without a wireless bra , but that is the NN she has to pay for the benefit of The NNP . Cotton is out of the question , as it comes from distant lands and pesticides are VBN for it . Very bad for the environment . We just saw on her Instagram that she ’s pretty angry with us . This was not our intention . From now on , at 7 p.m. we will turn off the WiFi and we will only switch it on again the next day after dinner for CD hours . In this NN we will save on electricity , so she is not bothered by electro - stress and will be totally isolated from the outside NN . This NN , she can concentrate solely on her homework . At eleven o’clock in the evening we will pull the breaker to shut the NN off to her room , so she knows that dark is RB dark . That will save a lot of CO2 . She will no longer be participating in winter sports to ski lodges and resorts , nor will she be VBG on anymore vacations with us , because our vacation destinations are practically inaccessible by bicycle . Since our daughter fully agrees with the girl on TV that the CO2 NNS and footprints of her great - grandparents are to blame for ‘ killing our NN ’ , what all this simply means , is that she RB has to live IN her great - grandparents and they never had a holiday , a car or RB a bicycle . We have n’t talked about the NN footprint of food yet . Zero CO2 footprint means no meat , no fish and no poultry , but RB no meat substitutes that are VBN on soy ( after all , that grows in farmers fields , that use machinery to harvest the beans , trucks to transport to the processing plants , where more NN is VBN , then trucked to the packaging / canning plants , and trucked once again to the stores ) and RB no imported food , because that has a negative ecological effect . And absolutely no chocolate from Africa , no coffee from South NNP and no tea from Asia . Only homegrown potatoes , vegetables and fruit that have been grown in local cold soil , because greenhouses run on boilers , piped in CO2 and artificial light . Apparently , these things are RB bad for The NNP . We will teach her how to grow her own food . Bread is still possible , but butter , milk , cheese and yogurt , cottage cheese and cream come from cows and they emit CO2 . No more margarine and no oils will be VBN for the frying pan , because that fat is palm oil from plantations in Borneo where rain forests RB grew . No NN cream in the summer . No soft drinks and no NN drinks , as the bubbles are CO2 . We will RB ban all plastic , because it comes from chemical factories . Everything made of steel and aluminum must RB be removed . Have you ever seen the amount of NN a blast furnace consumes or an aluminum smelter ? All bad for the NN ! We will replace her memory foam pillow top mattress , with a jute bag filled with straw , with a horse hair pillow . And finally , she will no longer be VBG makeup , soap , shampoo , cream , lotion , conditioner , toothpaste and medication . Facewashers will all be linen , that she can wash by hand , with her wooden washboard , just IN her female ancestors did before NN NN made her angry at us for destroying her future . In this NN we will VB her to do her part to prevent mass extinction , NN levels rising and the disappearance of entire ecosystems . If she truly believes she wants to walk the talk of the girl on TV , she will gladly accept and happily embrace her JJ NN of NN . This article was posted : Wednesday , December 4 , 2019 at 5:24 am

text: BIR SALAH , TUNISIA - Samira Sghaier and a group of friends prune moringa trees under a searing NN , dropping fistfuls of leafy branches into plastic tubs . Prickly acacias edge the plot of land , protecting bone - dry soil from further erosion . Sghaier ’s father once grew olive and fruit trees — varieties that mostly shriveled and died under her watch . “ There has n’t been enough rain in recent NNS , ” VBZ the 52 - NN - old farmer . Her tiny farm in eastern Tunisia is a bellwether for the dramatic JJ NNS already reshaping North Africa , which threaten to intensify with NN NN . Sandwiched between an encroaching Sahara and a VBG Mediterranean NNP , the region has seen a sharp drop in rainfall over the past half century — a trend experts VBP will likely intensify in the coming decades . Indeed , over the course of this century parts of North Africa as well as the Middle East might become uninhabitable , according to the German research and policy organization , the Max Planck Institute . “ We ’re seeing higher NNS and increasing NN stress , ” VBZ Essia Guezzi , NN and NN project officer for conservation group WWF North Africa , summing up some of the regional challenges . Meanwhile , rising NN levels threaten the region ’s largely coastal populations , she and others note . These and other issues will come into sharp focus during next month ’s NN summit in Spain , a fellow member of the Mediterranean region that is considered a NN hotspot — more vulnerable to the effects of NN NN than other parts of the NN . While Morocco has earned praise as a NN - NN leader , the North African region overall needs to do much more to counter an otherwise grim future , experts VBP . RB hampering efforts : some NNS are buffeted by conflict and civil unrest , while fossil fuels continue to drive Algerian and Libyan economies . Trying to turn the tide In Tunisia , fresh groundwater reserves are shrinking rapidly . Roughly CD - thirds of the land is threatened by desertification . The effects of NN NN are likely to slow the country ’s growth , hitting CD major revenue drivers — tourism and agriculture — according to a 2018 report by the Netherlands Foreign Ministry . While Tunisian authorities have outlined ambitious targets — including cutting NNS 41 percent by 2030 compared to 2010 levels — they have been slow to match words with NN , critics VBP . Nor did the issue figure high on candidates ’ priorities in recent legislative and presidential elections . “ It seems IN the environment and the impact of NN NN is the last concern of JJ Tunisian politicians , ” VBZ Hamadi Gharbi , WWF North Africa NNP and NNP project manager , who VBZ the country RB needs more NN financing and expertise . In the village of Bir Salah , Sghaier is trying , at least locally , to turn the tide . She and other area farmers began planting hardy acacia trees to VB reduce erosion , along with moringa , a fast - growing plant prized for its nutritional and medicinal properties . The idea was to VB fight NN NN and earn a profit doing so . The reality has not been so easy . “ Everyone likes JJ NNS , ” Sghaier VBZ , showing a visitor her storeroom packed with moringa oils and powders , along with bags of moringa - VBN bsissa , a Tunisian breakfast drink , which a group of growers have made and packaged . “ The problem is selling them , ” she VBZ . “ It ’s hard to find a NN . ” Across the Sahara , the African Union has spearheaded an ambitious ‘ Great Green Wall ’ initiative aimed to restore degraded land across a swathe of the Sahel , while RB offering income - generating opportunities for communities living there . “ The goal is to replant trees , to return the Sahel to what it was about 60 NNS ago , when there was a lot more forest cover , ” VBZ anthropologist Gilles Boetsch , director of a French scientific team working with Senegalese researchers in the region . There are plenty of setbacks he VBZ . JJ trees die and VBP to be replaced , while conflict in some Sahel NNS makes areas inaccessible . “ It does n’t work 100 percent , but it works , ” Boetsch VBZ , adding a similar regional initiative MD RB work north of the Sahara . “ The JJ problem is NN . The second is getting communities to accept the projects . ” In North Africa , some national projects to fight NN NN are making a difference , and Tunisia will reportedly present a regional oases protection project at the Madrid NN conference . Local farmers in northern Algeria are getting Mexican expertise to plant prickly pear , a cactus that offers a raft of nutritional and NN - generating benefits and needs little rainfall . Algeria is RB trying to revive a massive ‘ Green Dam ’ reforestation project that previously had disappointing results . In Tunisia ’s southeastern Gabes region , Dhafer Guezguez worked with the local NN in European Union - financed projects that included restoring oases and reintroduce native date palm NNS . The plants are hardy and nutritious , he VBZ , but not as sweet as popular commercial varieties . Attracting consumers will VB serious marketing . “ They VBP to be showcased as a product that ’s rare and good for you , ” Guezguez VBZ . “ The same kind of effort we saw in Europe and the NNP NNPS to VB NNS to eat organic NNS . ” The oases preservation initiatives have helped to boost local economies and restore depleted soil , he VBZ . Women dominate the workforce . The projects have continued RB after EU financing ended . Participants are RB making tourist handicrafts IN palm leaf bags and hats , to earn extra revenue . “ I VBP this is how , little by little , we can save the oases , ” Guezguez VBZ . “ When local communities realize it ’s in their interest to do so .

text: Here we VBP swaddling clothes for the baby - and a shroud for the mother . Here we VBP a baby 's cradle connected tragically with a woman 's coffin . Here we hear a birth cry and a death gurgle at CD and the same NN . The dying mother 's last act was to name her NN . " And she named the NN Ichabod . " And her last testimony was - as she thought upon the ark of NNP being taken by the Philistines - " The glory is departed from Israel . " It was goodbye to glory ! " Let us make some applications of that statement , RB though we MD appear as those who carve epitaphs on tombstones , or as those who write obituaries , or as those who wailingly and discordantly participate in funeral dirges . Though we MD be asking you to look through old windows upon scenes which others have described , though we MD travel some well - worn and familiar trails , though we MD serve the same food in somewhat JJ platters , still we make bold to ask you to remember that ' tis JJ ' . A Nation NNP Lose Its Glory The wife of Phinehas , passing through the swirling waters of the river of death , VBD : " The glory is departed from Israel " Thoughtfully scanning the pages of history , rubbing the dust of centuries off the tombs of some nations that underwent the frightful processes of self - burial , we can give the same testimonies concerning other nations . For 'tis JJ that , warmed by the NN which never loses its glory , a nation 's NN MD set in night . Under the stars - stars which never lose their splendor a nation 's starry crown MD lose its brightness , being displaced by a withered wreath of poison ivy or a circle of undesirable cactus , or by the brow becoming an eyeless , earless , tongueless , brainless skull . Beneath the heavens which declare the glory of NNP , RB as the firmament showeth His handiwork , a nation that circled the clouds as a strong - winged eagle , can flutter among the clouds as a broken - winged vulture or squawking parrot . Among the flowery continents of NNP a nation can become a place of foul odours that make the righteous stop their noses . text: With all of the discouraging NN about JJ deforestation and the destruction of the Amazon rainforest , it ’s good to VB that NNS in JJ parts of the NN are having great success at re-foresting NN NN . • A NN in NN : Here ’s how you can VB In Bhutan , for example , when the nation was celebrating the birth of a JJ prince in CD , NNS came together to plant 108,000 trees , which will become a JJ forest within a couple of decades . Ecuador set a NN record in 2017 for planting a whopping 647,250 trees in a single day . RB in 2017 , more than 1.5 CD volunteers came together to plant 66 CD trees in just 12 hours , setting another NN record . • WWF : NNP Has Lost 50 % of its Wildlife in the Past 40 NNS Now , NNP is reporting that in the findings of a 20 - NN NN of the NN , there are actually more trees today than there were CD decades ago , thanks in JJ part to the efforts of NNS and communities in India and NNP . The findings are the result of 20 NNS of NN collection from NNP instruments onboard CD satellites orbiting NN . A more detailed explanation from the NN : “ Satellite NNS show increasing leaf area of vegetation due to direct factors ( JJ land - use management ) and indirect factors ( such as NN NN , CO2 fertilization , nitrogen deposition and recovery from natural disturbances ) . Among these , NN NN and CO2 fertilization effects seem to be the dominant drivers . However , recent satellite NNS ( 2000 – 2017 ) reveal a greening pattern that is strikingly prominent in NNP and India and overlaps with croplands NN - wide . NNP alone accounts for 25 % of the JJ net increase in leaf area with only 6.6 % of JJ vegetated area . The greening in NNP is from forests ( 42 % ) and croplands ( 32 % ) , but in India is mostly from croplands ( 82 % ) with minor contribution from forests ( 4.4 % ) . “ [ Source ] Furthermore , the NN serves as a positive counter to the trend of pollution and JJ degradation we VBP today in Asia : The satellites have recorded photos of the NN every day for 20 NNS , creating a massive NN set that is allowing researchers and biologists to better understand how to preserve the NN ’s forests . “ This JJ - term NNS lets us dig deeper , ” VBD Rama Nemani , a research scientist at NNP ’s Ames Research Center and a co-author of the JJ work . “ When the greening of the NNP was RB observed , we thought it was due to a warmer , wetter NN and fertilization from the added NN dioxide in the atmosphere , leading to more leaf growth in northern forests , for instance . Now , with the MODIS NNS that lets us understand the phenomenon at RB JJ scales , we VBP that NNS are RB contributing . ” The message is clear : if we come together we can easily remedy the ecological problems we have created here on NN . Let this good NN serve as an inspiration to participate in the re-greening of NN . It RB demonstrates how NNS can address serious problems once they become aware of what ’s RB VBG on . text: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos on Monday committed $ CD CD of his fortune to set up a fund aimed at tackling the NN NN , weeks after hundreds of his employees signed a blog demanding the JJ retail giant take drastic steps to reduce its NN footprint . The fund , named Bezos NNP Fund , will begin issuing grants to NNS and activists this summer , the NN 's richest NN announced in an Instagram post . " NN NN is the biggest threat to our NN . I VBP to work alongside others both to amplify VBN ways and to explore JJ ways of fighting the devastating impact of NN NN on this NN we all share , " VBD Bezos , whose net worth is estimated to be $ 130 CD . " This JJ initiative will fund NNS , activists , NGOs — any effort that offers a real possibility to VB preserve and protect the natural NN . We can save NNP . It 's VBG to take collective NN from JJ NNS , JJ NNS , nation NNS , JJ organizations , and individuals , " he VBD . Read more : Amazon wins NN order to suspend $ CD CD US JJ contract with Microsoft Bezos ' personal donation follows Amazon 's " NNP Pledge " last NN which aims to make the NN NN neutral by 2040 . As part of the pledge , he had VBN Amazon MD meet the goals of the Paris Agreement by the same NN , CD NNS ahead of schedule — RB promising to buy 100,000 electric delivery vans . The task of reducing its NN footprint will be a challenging NN for the NN 's largest e-commerce NN which delivers CD CD items annually . The huge NN consumption of server farms VBN by Amazon 's cloud computing business further adds to its NN NNS . An advocacy group , Amazon Employees for NNP Justice , VBD it applauded Bezos ' initiative but added that " CD hand cannot give what the other is taking away . " The group RB questioned the NN 's support for oil and gas businesses . " The NNS of NNP VBP to VB : When is Amazon VBG to stop helping oil & gas NNS ravage NNP with still more oil and gas wells ... Will Jeff Bezos show us JJ leadership or will he continue to be complicit in the acceleration of the NN NN , while supposedly trying to VB ? " the group VBD in a statement . Read more : EU votes for more gas infrastructure , angering NN activists Criticism of Amazon 's NN policy has been mounting for several months , particularly from its own workforce . Last NN 's NN pledge was announced at the last moment , just a day before more than 1,700 employees had planned to walk off the job unless NN announced measures to curb its NNS .

text: The mare will foal in June . According to the trust , the foal is expected to live a normal NN . Claudia Harmata , PEOPLE.com , " Zebra Gives Birth to Rare Baby ' Zonkey ' After Mating With a Donkey , " 13 Apr. 2020 But then suddenly the zebra was spotted with a JJ addition : a JJ foal that did n’t quite look JJ . Alison Fox , Travel + Leisure , " Meet the Zonkey That 's Being Taken Care of at the David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust ( NNP ) , " 15 Apr. 2020 The Corolla Wild Horse Fund has a lot to celebrate after spotting a foal wandering the North Carolina barrier island last week . Meghan Overdeep , Southern Living , " Wild Horse Herd Welcomes NNP Foal Since Deadly Hurricane Season on the Outer Banks , " 7 Apr. 2020 Herd manager Meg Puckett shared a photo of the gangly foal , a bay with CD socks and a star , learning to walk alongside his mom , North Star . Meghan Overdeep , Southern Living , " Wild Horse Herd Welcomes NNP Foal Since Deadly Hurricane Season on the Outer Banks , " 7 Apr. 2020 RB the imperfect JJ attempts , foals standing on wobbly legs , were very good . This can have a particularly devastating effect on pregnant and nursing females and their foals , which are more fragile and require more resources to survive . Shepherd estimated that while 7,300 horses were captured in 2019 , 17,000 foals were born . text: We can no longer ignore the damage our natural environment is experiencing . In 2018 , NNS and leaders from across the NN published a report showing how a 1.5 °C increase in JJ NNS from pre-industrial levels is devastating our environment . We are facing more extreme NN , food shortages , rising NN levels and mass extinction of plants and animals , to name a few impacts . The report below explains the undeniable link between JJ activities and this NN increase . The report RB calls for drastic NNS in policy to prevent further damage to our environment . Read the special report ' JJ NN of 1.5 ºC ' IPCC on the IPCC website . In response , our NN has recommended a ‘ net zero ’ target for NN gases . CO2 ( NN dioxide ) is the main gas produced by JJ activities . Find out more on the causes of NN NN on the European Commission website . Our NN recognises that , to reduce CO2 and other NN gas NNS , we all VBP to VB . The good thing is we already have the answers we VBP to tackle NN NN and JJ degradation . All it takes is the will to act now . Across the NN the impacts of NN NN are being felt in various ways . In some NNS , we are seeing shifting NN patterns that threaten food production . Elsewhere , rapid glacier melt threatens NN level rise that risks catastrophic flooding . Currently the impacts of NN NN are worse in poorer NNS . Nonetheless , it is likely that NN NN will increasingly affect the UK in NNS to come . Impacts it is likely we will VB include : • Very cold winters will be rare . • Winters will be wetter and summers will be hotter and more prolonged . • NN level MD rise by 40 cm , leading to coastal erosion and flood risks . • NN increase will VB the crops we grow , impacting our diets . • NNS in NN will VB JJ illnesses , creating more problems for NNS and the elderly . • Foreign diseases associated with hot NN migrating north , for example , Malaria . • Cost of living to increase due to food , fuel and NN shortages . • Homes potentially damaged and insurance will increase due to severe NN . • Domestic crops will begin to struggle due to NN NN . • Soil will be less fertile as we struggle to grow crops that no longer thrive . • Some NNS cannot adapt to NNS . • The plants and trees that can grow will VB . • Dubbed as the “ evil twin of NN NN " . • The ongoing decrease in ocean pH , 30 % decrease so far . • Predicted 150 % by 2100 which has not been experienced for 400,000 NNS . • Wide implications for ocean NN , particularly animals with shells or skeletons . While NN NN is JJ in scale , Eden is no stranger to the impacts . The 2005 , 2009 and CD floods had damaging impacts across the district . We have suffered JJ , JJ and JJ losses . It is predicted similar flooding MD become more common as NNS increase . In December 2015 , Storm Desmond caused disruptions across Eden and Cumbria . It impacted homes and businesses for months after the event . The NNP NNP Act of 2008 was passed by our NN to ensure that we keep NN gas NNS at least 80 % lower than the 1990 baseline by 2050 , to avoid dangerous NN NN . The Act made the UK the JJ country with a legally binding framework to cut NN NNS . Alongside this Act , the Committee on NNP NNP was set up to advise the NN on legislation and progress on reducing NNS . The UK has struggled to meet NN targets set in this act , RB though the NN is getting stronger . NN NN effects are being experienced in our country , which we now must adapt to . Our experience of NN NN has already created costs to our economy , society and environment . We must work to mitigate against NN NN , as well as adapt to the impacts that we already experience . Mitigation : reducing NN NN Reducing NN gas NNS : NN efficiency , renewable NN , lower consumption rates , electric cars . Enhancing our NN sinks : planting trees and NN sequestering plants , invest in NN capture technology . NN : adapting to NN with NN NN Reduce our vulnerability to harmful effects .
