text: Decades of schizophrenic warnings about JJ NN and NN ages are bogus . With non -stop coverage of the latest doomsday doyenne the powers - who - should - not - be have strutted out on the stage , it ’s easy to forget just how JJ times dire warnings have been issued about how the NNP ’s NN was on the verge of wiping out all NN on the NN . For those of you fed up with the grating gyrations of Greta Thunberg ( the troubled teenager being VBN by NN - VB Chicken Little leftists IN George Soros and NNP NNP ) , here are some nasty little facts the NN - run NN MD love to keep under wraps . A few months after The Wizard of Oz had its theatrical premiere in Green Bay , Wisc. in 1939 , a newspaper headline appeared as follows : “ Greenland ’s Glaciers Melting , NNP Scientist . ” “ All the glaciers in Eastern Greenland are rapidly melting , declared Prof. Hans Ahlmann , Swedish geologist , ” the article screamed . “ It MD without exaggeration be VBN that the glaciers , IN those in Norway , face the possibility of a catastrophic collapse , ” Ahlmann crowed . They just love that word catastrophe , do n’t they ? Seven - and - a- half NNS later , Ahlmann — feted and touted by those much smarter than us — was at it again , issuing his dire warnings : “ The possibility of a prodigious rise in the NN of the ocean with resultant widespread inundation , arising from an Arctic NN phenomenon was discussed yesterday by Dr. Hans Ahlmann , a noted Swedish geophysicist at the NNP of California Geophysical Institute . A mysterious NN of the NN was slowly manifesting itself in the Arctic , ” stated Ahlmann , who warned that “ oceanic surfaces MD rise to catastrophic proportions and NNS living in the [ Greenland ] lowlands . . . MD be inundated . ” It ’s no mystery , Hans ; it ’s nature . “ Polar NN Thaw Increasing : Glaciers VBD To Be Melting , ” VBD the headline . This NN , Arctic expert Dr. William S. Carlson VBD that “ the Polar icecaps were melting at an astonishing and unexplained rate and were threatening to swamp seaports by raising the ocean levels . ” We ’re still waiting , NNP . Arctic explorer Adm. Donald McMillan was next to warn , stating , “ There are now 6 CD square NNS of NN in the Arctic . There once were 12 CD square NNS . ” Perhaps realizing their dire predictions were not panning out , the “ experts ” were no longer warning of JJ NN , but had switched to JJ cooling , and a coming NN age ! You ca n’t make this stuff up . The next expert trotted out was James P. Lodge Jr. , a scientist at the National Center for Atmospheric Research . In an article titled “ Scientist Predicts a NNP NNP Age by 21st century , ” Lodge warned that “ [ a ] ir pollution MD obliterate the NNP and VB a JJ NN age in the JJ third of the JJ century . ” Uh , Jim , can you pass me those sunglasses ? Things were so dire in the 1970s that CD of the nation ’s top geologists VBD it necessary to alert NNP Richard Nixon of the impending doom . “ [ A ] JJ deterioration of NN , by order of magnitude larger than any hitherto experienced by civilized mankind , is a very real possibility and indeed MD be due very soon . The present rate of cooling , ” they warned , “ seems fast enough to bring glacial NNS in about a century , if continuing at the present pace . ” By now , most of the JJ NN NN was on the bandwagon , running story after story on predictions of the coming NN age . “ An international team of specialists has concluded from eight indexes of NN that there is no end in sight to the cooling trend of the last 30 NNS , at least in the Northern Hemisphere , ” squawked the nation ’s “ newspaper of record . ” The following NN , “ The Gray Lady ” reversed course , predicting an Arctic meltdown , “ blaming JJ NN caused by NN dioxide NNS . . . . There is a real possibility that some NNS now in their infancy will live to a NN when the NN at the North Pole will have melted , a NN that MD VB swift and perhaps catastrophic NNS in NN . ” There ’s that word “ catastrophic ’ again . Not yet synched to spew identical nonsense , the Chicago Tribune still thought JJ cooling was the NN to VB , and “ reported ” some more unfounded , dire warnings about a freezing NN . Toward the end of the 1980s , however , the JJ NN playbook was adopted by all in the JJ NN NN , who have been constantly predicting polar icecap “ melting on a catastrophic scale . ” And of course , our good friends in the JJ NN NN MD never put the below in their fine papers or networks : In a Sept. 24 , Breitbart NNP Network headline , “ 500 NNS Write UN : ‘ There Is No NN Emergency , ’ ” the only NN platform with some heft reported on the letter sent from the oft - overlooked “ NNS and professionals in NN and related fields ” to the NNP Nations , “ asking for a JJ - overdue , high - level , open debate on NN NN . ” The CD - page letter should have been splattered across the pages and screens of all the major NN , but here ’s why it was n’t , as revealed by its main points : • There is no NN emergency . • NN is far slower than predicted . • CO2 is plant food , the basis of all NN on NNP . • Natural as well as anthropogenic factors VBP NN of the NNP . A wise NN once VBD , “ If you tell a lie JJ enough and keep repeating it , NNS will eventually come to VB it . ” Another wise NN once VBD , “ Freedom of the press is guaranteed only to those who own CD . ” Thank NNP there are honest alternative NN outlets IN NNP Free Press still publishing the truth about contentious topics . Dave Gahary , a JJ submariner in the U.S. Navy , prevailed in a suit brought by the NNP NNP NNP Exchange in an attempt to silence him . Her father Henry was CD of the top actors of the 20th century . Her brother Peter and her niece Bridget have RB had their share of success on the JJ screen . Fonda faced some challenges growing up . Pakula 's thriller Klute , which co-starred Donald Sutherland . On the JJ screen , Fonda continued to deliver strong performances . She RB starred in the hit thriller The NNP Syndrome ( 1979 ) with Jack Lemmon and Michael Douglas IN this NN . Another significant role for Fonda came a few NNS later . When Troy was a teenager , Fonda RB unofficially adopted a young African - JJ girl named Mary Williams . Williams later wrote about her NN with Fonda in the 2013 memoir The Lost Daughter . They VBD the same scale for the role of NN ( low , moderate or JJ ) . The researchers VBD that the NN period after the last NN age played a JJ role in vegetation NNS IN the NN . Areas that had the greatest NN NNS RB tended to be those with the greatest vegetation NNS , the NN showed . text: In 2018 , a 30 - minute documentary was premiered in San José , Costa Rica ’s capital and my hometown . The film followed the early efforts of a handful of marine biologists who are fighting coral bleaching . They grow tiny bits of coral in underwater nurseries and once they ’re JJ enough move them back to the reef , hoping to restore it . Their pace is slow , possibly too slow to keep up with bleaching due to NN NN . NN waters swipe entire reefs in a matter of weeks . The biologists VBP months to nurture enough corals to restore a couple of square meters . Reef restoration seems IN an impossible task , but they are relentless . It must be done to give corals a chance , so they are doing it . It ’s the same principle guiding young NN activists , atmospheric NNS and NN essayists . As author Rebecca Solnit wrote in CD : “ We do n’t VB what is VBG to happen , or how , or when , and that very uncertainty is the NN of hope . ” You might RB VB : • Why the NN is running out of sand In the dark movie theatre , I felt a JJ bond with the NNS carrying baby corals and the filmmakers chasing after them . We are , indeed , losing this battle . They understand that , I VBP , but in a tropical gulf thousands of NNS away from where diplomats and politicians decide our NN policies and international accords , a group of stubborn biologists and documentarists were refusing to give up . They were earning their own hope , CD coral at a NN . I VBP of these dogged coral reef NNS whenever I ’m asked , “ What gives you hope ? ” in the context of NN NN . It ’s a question full of nuance . Weighing it up , you have to consider the slew of recent record - breaking heatwaves , but RB the indomitable force of schoolchildren protesting for their futures . It acknowledges our dire situation , yet suggests there might be a NN forward . As NN NN awareness goes mainstream – along with the feelings of anxiousness , NN and grief that come with it – this question has quickly become code for : “ Where can I find hope ? ”

text: In honor of Rolling Stone ’s NNP NNP Issue , we asked artists to contribute messages about what they , their governments , and everyday NNS can do to stand up to the threat of NN NN . From England to Jamaica to the NNP NNPS , we are hearing from artists and activists IN the NN about what we can do locally , globally , and everything in between . If there ’s CD JJ - advocacy organization that needs no introduction , it ’s Greenpeace . The NGO has been RB for much longer than “ NN NN ” has been a commonplace phrase , lobbying heads of NNS and congresses IN the NN , and protesting for JJ causes on the open seas , since 1971 . Its actions have received the scorn of the fossil - fuel industry , the nuclear industry , the whaling industry , JJ other industries , and those industries ’ NN allies . ( The French NN RB admitted that its external intelligence agency , the General Directorate for External Security , VBD explosives to sink the Greenpeace vessel Rainbow Warrior in the Port of Aukland in 1985 . ) Annie Leonard is the executive director of Greenpeace USA ( the organization has 55 offices worldwide ) . NN NN is a major focus of her advocacy . “ What am I personally doing about NN NN ? A lot of things , I ’ll tell you . On an individual level , and RB on a broader society - wide level , because that ’s where we RB VBP the impacts , ” VBZ Leonard . “ CD of the things I ’m doing is RB investing in community , ” VBZ Leonard . She explains by fostering a strong sense of community with your immediate neighbors , you can better fight NN NN . They share things to reduce their NN footprints , for example , by borrowing ingredients from neighbors when baking a cake , instead of driving to the store for the CD egg needed . Having a strong community “ RB helps build support and meaning and the resilience and security that we ’re VBG to VB to VB through the NN NN together , just IN we ’re seeing strong communities RB now helping NNS VB through the NNP NN . ” Leonard RB argues it ’s important to focus on solutions , not just problems , to maintain a positive and achievable outlook on NN NN . She explains , “ NNS tell us , ‘ Oh , that ’s idealistic , you ’re asking for unicorns . ’ If you ’ve seen solutions in NN , you VBP that is not JJ . So it helps to make our commitment unshakeable . ” On a personal level , Leonard likes to grow her own vegetables , ride a bicycle , and rarely use disposable plastics , but maintains that “ those are n’t VBG to scale at the level we VBP to drive broad , broad NN . … Those are a great place to start , but a terrible place to stop . ” So where do we stop ? “ The single most important thing that we all have to do is stop burning fossil - fuels , ” including oil , coal , and gas , which Leonard points to as the leading culprit for NN NN . She RB advocates for diverting JJ subsidies away from these industries , and to renewable NN ( while taking care of communities and workers with a “ just transition ” ) . When it comes to fossil fuels : “ No JJ permits , no JJ ports , no JJ pipelines . ” Leonard VBZ the most important thing for individuals is to take NN : “ Find an organization or campaign that feels IN a good fit for you . There ’s so JJ to choose from . And contact them and ask how you can VB . If you VBP to join Greenpeace , we ’d love to have you involved . ”

text: ( from Wikipedia ) Dr. J. Marvin Herndon is an JJ interdisciplinary scientist , who earned his BA degree in physics in 1970 from the NNP of California , San Diego and his Ph.D. degree in nuclear chemistry in 1974 from Texas A&M NNP . For three NNS , J. Marvin Herndon was a post - doctoral assistant to Hans Suess and Harold C. Urey in geochemistry and cosmochemistry at the NNP of California , San Diego . He is the NNP of Transdyne Corporation in San Diego , California . He has been profiled in Current Biography , and dubbed a “ maverick geophysicist ” by The NNP Post . He suggested that the composition of the inner core of NNP is nickel silicide . The conventional view is that it is an iron–nickel alloy . More recently , he has suggested " georeactor " planetocentric nuclear fission reactors as NN sources for the gas giant outer planets as the NN source and production mechanism for the geomagnetic field and stellar ignition by nuclear fission . ( paper ) Deadly Ultraviolet UV-C and UV - B Penetration to NNP ’s NN : JJ and JJ NN Implications ( paper ) Contamination of the Biosphere with Mercury : Another Potential Consequence of On-going NNP Manipulation VBG Aerosolized Coal Fly Ash ( paper ) An Open Letter to Members of AGU , EGU , and IPCC Alleging Promotion of NNP NNP at the Expense of NNP and NNP NNP and Comments on AGU Draft Geoengineering Position Statement ( paper ) NN of Variable NN - heat Production , JJ Non-anthropogenic NN NN , and Geoengineered JJ NN and Polar Melting ( NN ) NN of Coal Fly Ash Toxic Chemical Geoengineering on the Troposphere : Consequences for NNP NNP Deadly Ultraviolet UV-C and UV - B Penetration to NNP ’s NN : JJ and JJ NN Implications This work was a joint effort between the authors that is part of an ongoing collaboration aimed at providing scientific , JJ , JJ NN implications and NN related to aerosolized coal fly ash including its use in the near - daily , near - JJ covert geoengineering activity . Author JMH was primary responsible for mineralogical and geophysical considerations . Author RDH was responsible for solar spectral irradiance measurements . Author MW was primarily responsible for JJ and JJ NN considerations . All authors read and approved the final manuscript . Author JMH was primary responsible for geophysical considerations . Author MW was primarily responsible for JJ and JJ NN considerations . Both authors read and approved the final manuscript . An Open Letter to Members of AGU , EGU , and IPCC Alleging Promotion of NNP NNP at the Expense of NNP and NNP NNP and Comments on AGU Draft Geoengineering Position Statement In september 2017 , Dr. J Marvin Herndon published a critical expose of the AGU , EGU , and IPCC alleging the promotion of falsified NN to promote certain globalist causes . This paper can be founin its entirety at this location : An Open Letter to Members of AGU , EGU , and IPCC Alleging Promotion of NNP NNP NN of Variable NN - heat Production , JJ Non-anthropogenic NN NN , and Geoengineered JJ NN and Polar Melting The publication has been announced in PR Newswire . You can view the paper there or use the link at the bottom of this section : Quote From the Announcement Either directly or indirectly , Dr. Herndon is exposing the propaganda that is being spread by governments claiming that jet trails are " contrails " . NNP Skywatch has been actively working to open the NN 's eyes to this very harmful aerosol injection for NNS . In the announcement , Dr. Herndon VBZ : NN models evaluated by the IPCC are VBN on the assumptions that : ( 1 ) Heat derived from the NNP is constant ; ( 2 ) Heat derived from within the NNP is constant ; and , ( 3 ) Anthropogenic contributions to atmospheric NN stem mainly from heat retention by CO2 and other NN gases . Geophysical NN of variable earthquake activity and geological NN of variable submarine volcanism presented here indicate that heat added to the oceans is variable . The increasing occurrences of earthquakes of magnitudes ≥ 6 and ≥ 7 during 1973 - 2015 indicate volcanic activity is increasing and therefore NNP - heat , as well as volcanic CO2 additions , is increasing . Moreover , increased heat additions to the ocean act to decrease seawater solubility of CO2 , ultimately releasing additional CO2 to the atmosphere . Furthermore , increasing submarine volcanic activity implies increasing ocean acidification , but NNS are insufficient to make quantitative estimates . The validity of IPCC evaluations and assessments depends critically upon due consideration being given to all processes that potentially affect NNP ’s heat balance . In addition to the geological and geophysical processes discussed , the scientific community , including IPCC NNS , has turned a blind eye to ongoing tropospheric geoengineering that in recent NNS has been occurring on a near - daily , near - JJ basis . Tropospheric aerosolized particulates , evidenced as coal fly ash , inhibit rainfall , heat the atmosphere , and VBP JJ NN . NN obtained from an accidental air - drop release indicates efforts to melt glacial NN and enhance JJ NN . By ignoring ongoing tropospheric geoengineering , IPCC assessments are compromised , as is the moral authority of the NNP Nations . NN of Coal Fly Ash Toxic Chemical Geoengineering on the Troposphere : Consequences for NNP NNP In this NN , Dr. J Marvin Herndon exposes the NN demonstrating that toxic substances are being sprayed into the atmosphere , and that at least some of these substances match the chemical footprint for toxic coal fly ash , which is VBN to contain heavy metals such as mercury , aluminum , lead , arsenic , cadmium , selenium , thallium , boron , antimony , barium , strontium , vanadium , beryllium , chromium , and cobalt . Paper : Obtaining NN of Coal Fly Ash NN in NN Modification ( Geoengineering ) Through Analysis of Post - Aerosol - Spraying Rainwater and Solid Substances In January 2015 , Dr. Herndon wrote a letter to the San Diego city council expressing his concern about chemtrails . This letter has been reprinted below . January 16 , 2015 To : Mayor Kevin L. Faulconer , and San Diego City Council Members From : J. Marvin Herndon , Ph.D . Subject : Pervasive Toxic Aerosol Spraying of San Diego Residents I am a scientist ( PhD in nuclear chemistry , Post - Doctoral in Geochemistry and Cosmochemistry ) and businessman , and have lived in Scripps Ranch for thirty seven NNS . Over the past NN the skies above San Diego have changed drastically in plain sight . We ’ve been robbed of the beautiful blue skies we associate with our city . Almost every day jet airliners are spraying innumerable so - called “ chemtrails ” and they persist after release behind the jets to gradually form clouds . Chemical clouds . Toxic clouds . They eventually diffuse and form a white haze in the sky . Sometimes , the artificial clouds are laid so thickly as to make the otherwise blue San Diego sky fully overcast with toxic chemical aerosols . Sometimes , depending on chemical mix , the transition from spray to white haze is rapid . Please VB a few examples , attached , that I photographed from my front yard . Chemicals sprayed into the atmosphere do not remain suspended ; they fall to contaminate the air we breathe , our rainwater , and our agricultural soil . This ongoing massive spraying taking place over San Diego represents a grave threat to me and my family , my neighbors , and all my fellow San Diegans . Rainwater collected after intensive aerosol spraying now reportedly contains elevated levels of aluminum , barium , and strontium and likely other toxins . Aluminum is implicated in diseases such as Alzheimer ’s , Parkinson ’s , and NN , whose rising incidence is causing alarm to JJ Americans . How JJ additional NNS will be doomed to suffer a lifetime of NN ? How JJ additional San Diegans will suffer premature brain degeneration or cancer ? What horrors lie in store for our NNS and grandchildren who unknowingly play outdoors , or the pregnant women with their unborn offspring , or the runners and other outdoor recreationists ? What about those of us who suffer asthma or who have compromised NN systems ? What about the elderly ? What about your own family ? Are we San Diegans no longer free to breathe uncontaminated air ? Why are San Diego ’s Mayor and members of San Diego City Council silent about this imminent JJ NN threat ? Were you duped into believing that toxic chemical clouds will keep NNP from VBG ? Clouds might reflect sunlight back into NN but those same artificial clouds RB keep NNP from cooling by not letting NNP ’s heat escape during the night . Clouds , artificial or natural , trap heat ! Why the silence ? Are you afraid there will be demonstrations or riots in the streets if the truth were VBN about the ongoing activity that poisons the air San Diegans are now breathing ? Deception by acquiescence and silence is fundamentally wrong , unless you are a willing participant in activities that will likely come to be characterized as crimes against humanity . As elected officials you have the responsibility to advise and protect all San Diegans . Please speak the truth and stop this spraying over our homes . The following links provide NN you MD find of benefit . Chemtrail websites : http://www.geoengineeringwatch.org/ http://stopsprayingcalifornia.com/ http://www.endgeoengineering.com/index.html Interview with a neurosurgeon : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3lW-TGGlk0 Please advise me of your intensions to make JJ disclosure of the chemical spraying over San Diego . Kindly respond before the close of business on January 23 , 2015 , or I will assume you have no intention of responding . Sincerely , J. text: In coastal Antarctica , some snow is n't white — it 's green . And while JJ amounts of the green snow have been visible for NNS , it 's starting to spread across the continent because of NN NN . According to a NN published Wednesday in the journal Nature Communications , the vibrant color is caused by microscopic algae blooming across the NN of the snow . VBG satellite NNS and fieldwork observations , a team of researchers at the NNP of Cambridge and the British Antarctic Survey have created the JJ JJ - scale map of the green algae and predicted the future spread of the bizarre snow . Green snow appears along the Antarctic coast , growing in " warmer " areas , where the average NNS reach just above freezing in the summer . Although the individual algae are microscopic , when they grow at scale , the green snow can RB be seen from NN . For the NN , the team combined on - the - ground research from CD summers in the Antarctic Peninsula with images from the European NNP Agency 's Sentinel 2 satellite taken between 2017 and 2019 . In total , the team identified over 1,600 separate algal blooms on the snow NN . The team VBD that the distribution of green snow algae is strongly influenced by marine birds and mammals , because their excrement works extremely well as fertilizer . Over 60 % of blooms were VBN near penguin colonies , and others were VBN near birds ' nesting sites . " This is a significant advance in our understanding of land - VBN NN on Antarctica , and how it might VB in the coming NNS as the NN warms , " lead author Dr. Matt Davey of the NNP of Cambridge VBD in a press release . If bird populations are strongly affected by NN NN , as they likely will be , the algae MD lose key sources of nutrients . But the results of the NN indicate that green snow will massively spread as JJ NNS rise . That 's because in order to flourish , the organisms VBP an available supply of NN . NNS on the peninsula where the green snow is VBN have risen dramatically in recent decades , increasing the amount of NN available . As the NN warms and more of Antarctica 's snow melts , the algae will spread , the NNS VBD . And while some algae will be lost to areas that lose snow altogether , much more will be gained . " As Antarctica warms , we predict the overall mass of snow algae will increase , as the spread to higher ground will significantly outweigh the loss of JJ island patches of algae , " VBD co-lead author Dr. Andrew Gray , of the NNP of Cambridge and the NNP of Edinburgh . It 's unclear how the spreading algae will affect the NN . It plays a key role in cycling nutrients and pulling NN dioxide from the atmosphere through photosynthesis , Davey VBD , but RB darkens snow , and absorbs more heat from the NN . The amount of algae VBN by the team creates a NN sink that absorbs about 500 tons of NN each NN , the equivalent of about 875,000 average car journeys in the U.K. , researchers VBD . The amount of algae VBN is actually a conservative estimate , because the satellite was only capable of picking up green algae , missing its red and orange counterparts . text: In recent NNS , NN NN has loomed IN a dark specter over the globe , contributing to everything from gentrification in Miami to refugees fleeing drought and crop shortages in Guatemala . But the urgency IN the issue reached JJ heights in 2018 when the NNP Nations ' Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) stated that rapid , " far - reaching and unprecedented NNS in all aspects of society " MD be needed in order to drop NN dioxide levels by 2030 and prevent catastrophic JJ NN . NNS have indeed proposed drastic measures — just not in the NN that you might VB . In the same IPCC report , the U.N. suggests that adding 2.5 CD acres ( 1 CD hectares ) of forest to the NN MD limit JJ NN to 2.7 degrees Fahrenheit ( 1.5 degrees Celsius ) by 2050 . In other words : Responding to NN NN will require planting JJ trees . A lot of them . And now , the U.N. might just have the NNS to back up their proposal . In a recent NN , unveiled July 5 , 2019 in the journal NNP , a group of researchers associated with the Crowther Lab in Switzerland VBD that JJ tree restoration to the tune of 223 CD acres ( 900 CD hectares ) of canopy cover — an area that 's approximately the size of the U.S. — is " our most effective NN NN solution to date . " These trees MD store 205 CD tons ( 186 metric tons ) of NN , or roughly CD thirds of the NN that has been emitted " as a result of JJ activity since the Industrial Revolution , " according to a press release . Although some NN reports have VBN this much forest restoration is the equivalent of roughly 1 trillion trees , this statistic is actually linked to an estimate from an older 2015 NN . Jean - François Bastin , the Crowther Lab 's NN lead author , breaks down their 2019 analysis by email . " The idea was to estimate what tree cover MD be expected when you removed the ' JJ factor , ' i.e. what specific types of forest MD naturally occur in the absence of other development , and where , " he VBZ . Bastin and his team VBD a form of artificial intelligence VBN as " machine learning " to build " a model to link tree cover with NN / soil / topography , VBN on 78,000 observations of tree cover in protected areas . " The researchers then projected the NNS further to estimate the " total potential tree cover of the NN , " Bastin explains . Afterward , the team excluded land currently being VBN for urban settlements , croplands and existing forests , which yielded the total amount of land available for restoration . The NN includes a map showing how much tree coverage JJ parts of the globe can support ; the top three areas include NNP , Canada and the U.S . In JJ ways , the NN 's timing MD n't be more perfect , as it aligns with current JJ efforts IN ecological restoration . CD example is the Trillion Trees Vision , which seeks to restore 1 trillion trees by 2050 . Another is the Bonn Challenge , which is a partnership between the NN of Germany and the U.N. 's International Union for Conservation of Nature that aims to restore 371 CD acres ( 150 CD hectares ) of deforested land by 2020 . You might be thinking , well , that sounds pretty easy . Let 's all roll up our sleeves and save the NN by planting CD tree at a NN — RB ? But some experts VBP the situation is actually a little more complicated than that rosy picture . Especially if most nations do n't chip in to VB . " Implementation of forest restoration on the scale discussed in this paper is not as straightforward as it might seem , " VBZ Jim Hallett , chair of the board of directors for the Society for Ecological Restoration . " By 2018 , there were commitments of over 420 CD acres ( 170 CD hectares ) by 58 nations , which exceeds the Bonn Challenge goal . Current estimates indicate that RB 29 percent of the committed lands are now under restoration , but most of this work has been done by a few NNS . " Hallett cites major challenges to implementing restoration on such a JJ scale , " including financing , governance , land tenure and ownership , [ and ] capacity to do the work . " Hallett concludes , " there is ample NN that , in some contexts , if the benefits of restoration are not equally shared , the project will fail . So incentive programs have to be carefully developed . " Although Hallett agrees that forest restoration is important to addressing NN NN , restoration alone will likely not be enough . It takes NN , after all , to implement such JJ restoration projects and RB for these trees to store NN . And Hallett stresses that " the possibility of future restoration should not be VBN as an excuse for degrading intact lands . " Other NNS question not only the practicality of the NN 's claims , but RB the NN 's very methodology . " JJ of the allegedly available restoration areas are clearly unsuitable for more trees than they currently support . If you look closely at the map , a JJ proportion of these areas are in regions where soils are permanently frozen , " VBZ Eike Luedeling , a NN NN researcher and professor of horticultural sciences at the NNP of Bonn . Luedeling continues , " The methodology implicitly ( probably not on purpose ) implies that NN NN is proportional to canopy cover , i.e. ecosystems without trees contain no NN . This is clearly JJ and strongly inflates the JJ estimate [ of restoration ] . " Jan Börner , Luedeling 's colleague and a professor for economics of sustainable land use at the NNP of Bonn , is similarly skeptical . Börner VBZ that some areas being proposed for restoration under the current NN are already in use for other purposes . Börner considers the NN to be an " interesting academic exercise ... but as a [ NN NN ] mitigation strategy proposal ( and it is being advertised as such ! ) , it sends a misleading signal to the international NN policy debate . " But do n't fret just yet . Both Bastin and Hallett emphasize that the U.N. has declared 2021 to 2030 the " Decade on Ecosystem Restoration , " which MD spur nations to act quickly — and some NNS are already tackling the initiative head on . And , according to Hallett , forest restoration boasts far more perks than just impacting NN NN , including maintaining — or RB increasing — biodiversity and preserving the ecosystem that we NNS rely upon for our food and NN . But RB the NN 's authors acknowledge that it 's VBG to take a lot of goodwill to make this grand vision a reality . " What we VBP is universal NN : international agencies , NGOs , governments , all citizens — anyone can be involved , " VBZ Bastian . " Local communities and JJ organizations MD be especially effective . While they do not have the same reach as national agencies , they have the benefit of knowing what works best in their own backyards . text: Scenario in which JJ civilization experiences catastrophic events due to NN NN A NN apocalypse ( RB called a NN dystopia and a NN - induced collapse , among other names ) is a hypothetical scenario involving the JJ collapse of JJ civilization and potential JJ extinction as either a direct or indirect result of anthropogenic NN NN and ecological breakdown . Under a JJ catastrophe of this scale , some or all of the NNP MD be rendered uninhabitable as a result of extreme NNS , severe NN events , an inability to grow crops , and an altered composition of the NNP 's atmosphere . [ 1 ] Although there is consensus on the attribution of recent NN NN to JJ activity , [ 2 ] and concern about future tipping points and feedback loops , there is no consensus on the likelihood of NN - induced collapse .[ citation needed ] Rhetoric and belief centered on apocalypticism has deep roots in religious contexts , and similar rhetorical approaches undergird secular apocalyptic interpretations of NN . [ 3 ] Historical interpretations fall into CD visions of apocalypse : the tragic and the comic . Tragic apocalypticism frames a clearly divided good and evil , with preordained events . In contrast , comic framing emphasizes flawed JJ agency , and it tends to be characterized by an open - ended , episodic , and ongoing timeline . [ 4 ] Some of the most significant books in environmentalism make use of either the tragic or comic apocalyptic framing : Carson 's Silent Spring ( 1962 ) , Ehrlich 's The Population Bomb ( 1972 ) , and NNP Gore 's NNP in the Balance ( 1992 ) . [ 5 ] There is no single agreed term VBN to describe an JJ and ecological collapse as either a direct or indirect result of anthropogenic NN NN , however such an event has been explored in both fiction and non-fiction for JJ NNS . Jules Verne 's 1889 novel The Purchase of the North Pole imagines NN NN due to a deliberate tilting of NNP 's axis . Since NNP NNP II , there has been continual discussion of JJ destruction due to nuclear NN . [ 6 ] [ 7 ] There is a Western NN tradition of describing a NN apocalypse with images and descriptions of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse and other features of the apocalypse of the Christian faith . [ 8 ] [ 9 ] [ CD ] [ 11 ] [ 12 ] JJ NN reduces the capacity of the oceans to absorb oxygen . Biomarkers and geologic NN suggests that oxygen - deprived oceans resulting from high NN dioxide concentrations MD have contributed to the five previous mass extinction events in NNP 's history . Geoscientists have VBN that anaerobic microbes MD have thrived in these conditions and produced vast amounts of hydrogen sulfide gas . Hydrogen sulfide is toxic , and its lethality increases with NN . At a critical threshold , this toxic gas MD have been released into the atmosphere , causing plant and animal extinctions both in the ocean and on land . Models suggest that this MD RB have damaged the ozone layer , exposing NN on NNP to harmful levels of UV radiation . Deformities VBN in fossil spores in Greenland provides NN that this MD have occurred during the Permian extinction event . At the end of the Paleocene and Triassic eras , mass extinctions occurred at NN dioxide concentrations of RB 1,000 ppm . If these concentrations were reached again in the future , either as a result of anthropogenic or naturally occurring NN gas NNS , it is possible that such an event MD be repeated . [ 13 ] [ 14 ] Rising NNS increase the NN of an epidemic or NN . As the NN NNS , distributors of infectious diseases such as mosquitoes and ticks spread to JJ areas and transmit illnesses to regions which MD not have experienced them otherwise . Epidemics are RB made more likely after severe NN events , such as heavy rainfall or flooding . Food scarcity MD lead some communities to a more meat - VBN diet , which raises the NN of outbreaks of diseases such as ebola . Melting permafrost RB threatens to release diseases that have been dormant for JJ NNS , as was the NN in August CD when a thawed reindeer carcass that was almost a century old infected several individuals in Siberia with anthrax . [ 15 ] JJ plants have a maximum NN at which they can grow , and NN NN MD mean that JJ pests are introduced to areas where it was too cold for them to survive before . Extreme NN events and more frequent droughts will RB affect crop production as the NNP approaches and surpasses 2 °C ( 3.6 °F ) above pre-industrial levels . text: NN policy is dangling between the cynicism of Donald NNP and the radicalism of Greta Thunberg . The US NN has just pulled the NN ’s second - largest emitter of NN gases out of the Paris NN accord . Ms Thunberg demands significantly more than a 50 per cent cut in JJ net NNS by 2030 . The NN is certainly irresponsible . But the latter seems inconceivable . The exasperation of radical NN activists is understandable . Despite decades of talk , NNS of NN gases and JJ NNS continue to rise . If the trend does not alter soon , the chances of avoiding an increase in JJ average NNS of more than 1.5C above pre-industrial levels will be zero and those of avoiding a 2C increase will be tiny . As the IMF notes in its latest Fiscal Monitor , meeting the latter goal requires reducing NNS of NN gases by a third below the baseline , by 2030 . To keep below a 1.5C increase , NNS VBP to be half of the baseline . The longer the delay in acting , the larger the required NN becomes , until nothing can be done because it will be too late . It is already almost too late to avoid what experts view as destructive and irreversible NNS in NN . For that reason , dramatic policies are needed . Yet they are feasible , argues the NNP Transitions Commission , if they are firmly implemented over the next three decades . Unfortunately , the outright opposition of NNS such as Mr NNP , and the indifference of much of the population , are not the sole obstacles to success . RB some who favour NN are a problem , because the NN NN is for them part of a wider campaign against the NN . Thus , JJ supporters of the Green NNP Deal view NN as a justification for the planned economy . As British journalist Paul Mason argues : “ Labour wants to combat NN NN through three mechanisms : NN spending , NN lending and the NN direction of private finance . ” This approach allows opponents to argue that the left is more concerned with destroying NN economies than saving the NN . The mess created by trying to plan an economy into zero net NNS in a decade might bring all attempts at mitigation into disrepute . In any NN , NN NN will not be solved by CD country . To succeed , policy must be effective , legitimate and JJ . To be effective , policy must combine planning , regulation , research and incentives . There is strong justification for NN actions in research , spatial planning and finance . But there is RB a NN for incentives aimed at shifting behaviour . Command and NN are rarely as effective all on their own . The IMF report suggests $ 75 a tonne of NN might be the NN in 2030 consistent with keeping the NN increase below 2C . Today , while there are a host of pricing arrangements , the prices themselves are mostly far too low and variable over NN and across NNS to be useful . Yet , in principle , a NN tax , or an NNS trading NN with a NN floor , is the most effective ( because most comprehensive ) NN to influence NNS . Schemes that generate fiscal revenue ought RB to be attractive to politicians , because the NN can be VBN for other valuable purposes . Taxing a “ bad ” ( a form of pollution , in this NN ) always offers an opportunity to improve taxation or raise valuable spending . An important point made by the IMF report is that such NNS as NNP and India MD benefit especially from a reduction in local JJ pollution , because of the benefits of reduced use of coal . It is RB vital that these NNS do VB such benefits from use of NN taxes , because they are VBG to have to play a JJ part in bringing about the needed reductions in JJ NNS ( relative to the baseline ) . It is in these NNS , too , that a huge part of the needed investment in JJ NN systems must be made . So incentives matter greatly . To make policy legitimate , it is essential to compensate losers . It is not JJ that the poor are always proportionately most adversely affected by higher NN prices . But protests by the rest of the population matter , too . Compensation for higher fuel prices needs to be visible . As important , a convincing vision of a better future must be offered . Otherwise , the necessary NNS in policy will never be accepted . Finally , policy has to be JJ , with all the bigger economies involved . This creates huge problems of equity . Clearly we are never VBG to reach a perfect solution . But some solution will have to be VBN in generous assistance from high - income NNS to emerging and developing NNS , especially with the introduction of JJ technologies . This RB raises an important question : what is to be done with free - riders and , above all , the biggest free - rider of all , the rogue US ? The answer in principle is clear : it will have to be penalised quite heavily . If we accept , as we should , the urgency of the challenge , this follows quite naturally . What , then , is to be done ? The answers include a programme of NN over three decades , starting now ; pragmatic resort to all policy tools , including NN - VBN incentives ; use of the revenue raised from NN pricing to compensate losers and make the tax NN and NN mitigation more efficient ; a stress on the local environment benefits of eliminating the use of fossil fuels ; and , above all , a commitment to NN as a shared JJ challenge . In an era of populism and nationalism , is there any chance of all this ? Not obviously , alas . If so , we will indeed have failed . But the young are surely JJ to expect better . text: With No Visitors , Australian Scuba NNS Are Planting Coral On Great Barrier Reef While the Australian tourism industry MD have dried up in the NN lockdown , dive tour operators have decided to put their NN to good use by planting coral along the Great Barrier Reef . Family - owned Cairns - VBN NN Passions of Paradise have provided a catamaran and fuel . Other businesses involved include Wavelength , Ocean Freedom , Sailaway and Quicksilver Cruises . They are working alongside a team from the NNP of Technology Sydney led by Dr. David Suggett . The initiative is called the Coral Nurture Program . Similar projects in the area were already in place , such as the Crown - of - Thorns ( a coral destroying starfish ) eradication and the Eye on Reef monitoring program . But what makes this latest project unique is that it ’s the JJ NN tour NNS have worked together with researchers . The technique being VBN to restore the coral – VBG ‘ coral clips ’ , is RB a JJ . Lorna Howlett , project coordinator and PhD student , explains how it works : “ It involves finding fragments of opportunity – coral fragments that have naturally broken off , ” she VBD . “ And attaching them back on to the reef VBG a coral clip . We can only use fragments of opportunity VBN at the site , so Passions of Paradise has installed six frames at the site which can be VBN as a nursery to grow more corals . ” Approximately 1000 pieces of coral have been planted on Hastings Reef so far . The Great Barrier Reef is home to an incredibly diverse array of sea-life and was declared a NNP Heritage Area in 1981 . Situated off the northeast coast of Australia , it stretches for RB 2300 km . It is the biggest coral reef NN in the NN , comprising RB 2900 individual reefs and 900 islands . A 2014 report by the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority VBD that NN NN and JJ heating is the biggest threat to the reef . Polluted land NN quality running into the NN , coastal development , fishing , ocean acidification and coral bleaching are other major issues . According to a 2012 report , the Great Barrier Reef has lost half it ’s coral since 1985 . In 2015 , the Reef 2050 Plan came into place . This is a 35 - NN plan for the JJ - term management of pollution and NN NN . Anthony McLennan is an experienced journalist who has written for some of South Africa ’s biggest publications . RB a photographer , soccer coach , dog- lover and surfer , enjoys spending NN outdoors in beautiful Cape Town . He believes that a JJ approach is needed to sustain our NN and that it is important to put this message out .

text: Pharma hack Paul Offit accidentally admits that the FDA ’s process for licensing NNS is fraudulent In a failed attempt at trying to dissuade educated NNS against choosing to not have their NNS vaccinated VBN on antibody NN tests , NNP Pharma hack Paul Offit has inadvertently admitted , on the record , that the federal NN ’s official NN policies are fundamentally flawed , at best , and very likely scientifically fraudulent . In a recent NN published by the “ NNP Education Center ” at the NNP ’s Hospital of Philadelphia ( CHOP ) where he works , Offit tries to make the NN that antibody NN tests , which measure antibody levels as an indicator of immunity against NN , are n’t medically useful . If this is the NN , then everything that the Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) and Centers for NNP NNP and Prevention ( CDC ) rely upon to create NN policy is RB not medically useful , or accurate . VBG antibody NN tests to try to measure a protective JJ response , in Offit ’s own words , is “ not as easily done as you MD VB . ” And yet , the presence of antibodies in the NN has RB been what NN officials claim is , in fact , a valid indicator that a person is JJ to NN – so which is it ? The answer is neither and both , depending upon what ’s trying to be accomplished . In Offit ’s NN , the goal is to keep as JJ NNS as possible on the NN train , which will ensure that NN manufacturers VBP himself continue to rake in massive profits . At the same NN , Offit ’s very argument is invalidated by his own admissions towards this end , as he clearly VBZ in the NN that antibody titer does not necessarily correlate with immunity . Similarly , a lack of antibodies is not necessarily an indicator of a lack of immunity . VBG a NN outbreak that occurred during the late 1980s and early 1990s to try to make his point , Offit VBZ in the NN that , when looking back on this particular outbreak , it was discovered that “ there were JJ NNS who had been vaccinated , but who did n’t have antibodies against NNS who were still protected . ” In other words , antibody tests are n’t , in fact , a valid indicator of immunity , RB though this is what the NN uses as “ NN ” that NNS somehow work . “ The reason they were still protected is they had something called memory cells , ” Offit further explains . “ Memory immunological cells , IN B - and T - cells , which then , when they were exposed to the NN , became activated , differentiated , made antibodies , which then protected them . So RB though they did n’t have circulating antibodies in their bloodstream , they still have these memory cells in their JJ NN that MD then respond when they were exposed . So , if you looked at those NNS and saw they did n’t have antibodies , you MD have falsely concluded they were n’t protected when they were . ” For more NN about the NN ’s NN fraud , be sure to check out Vaccines.news . Thank you , Paul Offit , for once again illustrating why NNS should n’t vaccinate their NNS Offit goes on in the NN to admit that sometimes you can have antibodies in your bloodstream “ and not be protected ” – again , his own words . As it turns out , it appears to be some combination of antibody levels , cell - mediated immunity , and mucosal immunity that provides JJ protection against NN , depending on the NN , meaning NN NN as it ’s currently being propagated by JJ NN officials is wholly inaccurate and unreliable . It remains unclear whether or not Offit truly realizes what he ’s confessed to , here , seeing as how the NN in question is still available for viewing on the CHOP website . Or perhaps Offit is too dense to RB realize what he ’s now publicly admitted , which only goes to show how deluded these NN - pushers are when it comes to their methods of persuasion . Hilariously , Offit ’s conclusion in the NN is n’t that the entirety of NN NN needs to be reevaluated due to these inherent flaws . Instead , he VBZ that , because “ titers are difficult , ” and “ not a perfect indicator ” of immunity , that “ the best NN of knowing that you ’re protected is to VB the NNS that are recommended at the NN they are recommended . ” In other words , nothing the NN lobby has been saying for decades makes an ounce of sense , and the whole thing is obviously a fraud . But keep on getting your NNS , NNS , because that ’s the only NN to keep yourself safe and healthy ! CD wonders : Who is actually buying this tripe anymore and subjecting their family to its illogical provisions ? “ Far from providing NNS with a convincing argument for why they should strictly comply with the CDC ’s childhood NN schedule , what Paul Offit and the CHOP have provided us with in this NN is a strong argument for why the very process by which NNS obtain licensure by the FDA is scientifically invalid , ” writes Jeremy R. Hammond , a contributing writer for NNP ’s NNP Defense ( CHD ) . “ Indeed , the conclusion seems inescapable that the FDA ’s use of antibody titers as a surrogate measure of immunity for the purposes of NN licensure amounts to scientific fraud . ” Be sure to read Hammond ’s full , in - depth analysis of Offit ’s NN at NNP ’s NNP Defense .

text: Here ’s the bad : The ship , Kapitan Dranitsyn , burned so much fuel that now it , too , has to be resupplied . Another icebreaker is on its NN to bring it more fuel . Such are the logistical complexities of the expedition , VBN as Mosaic , in which a German research ship , Polarstern , has been drifting with the NN NN in the Arctic Ocean since October with a revolving complement of NNS . The ship is expected to come out of the NN east of Greenland in September after gathering a NN ’s worth of NNS on conditions in the remote Central Arctic . The Kapitan Dranitsyn left Tromso , Norway , on Jan. 29 with 43 tons of food , fuel and other supplies for the Polarstern , as well as a replacement team of researchers and technicians for what is the third CD - month leg of the expedition . The resupply trip was expected to take about CD weeks , but the icebreaker ran into trouble from the start , when a storm in the Barents NNP forced it to anchor off Tromso for the better part of a week . Once underway , the ship encountered NN NN that had gotten much thicker as the winter progressed — doubling to more than 5 NNS , or 1.5 meters , in places . The Kapitan Dranitsyn finally arrived at the Polarstern on Feb. 28 . After several days unloading the supplies and transferring personnel across about a half - mile of NN in dangerous conditions ( a wind chill of minus 72 degrees Fahrenheit , or about minus 58 Celsius ) , the Kapitan Dranitsyn left for the return trip to Tromso . But calculations showed that it MD not have enough diesel fuel for the journey . So on March 3 , another icebreaker , the Admiral Makarov , left Murmansk , NNP , with a load of extra fuel to intercept the Kapitan Dranitsyn on its NN . Early this week , the CD ships were about 350 NNS , or roughly 560 kilometers , apart . Markus Rex , an atmospheric scientist who is Mosaic ’s leader , wrote in a blog post that the delay in resupplying the Polarstern was “ absolutely in keeping with what had to be expected ” given the NN conditions .

text: veryone faces choices every day that carry a NN cost . Do we turn the lights on in the morning , or is the light of daybreak sufficient for finding matching socks ? Do we feast on bacon and eggs for breakfast , or will a bowl of oatmeal suffice ? There is a lot of talk these days about the NN to lead lower - NN lifestyles . There is RB a lot of finger - pointing VBG on and , some argue , virtue signaling . But who is truly walking the NN walk ? The carnivore who does n’t fly ? The vegan who travels to VB family abroad ? If nobody is without NN sin , who gets to cast the JJ lump of coal ? If all NN advocates were expected to live off the grid , eating only what they MD grow themselves and wearing only the clothes they ’d knitted from scratch , there MD n’t be much of a NN movement . That level of sacrifice is unacceptable to most . We do n’t VB to ban cars ; we VBP to electrify them ( and we VBP that electricity to come from clean NN ) . We do n’t VB to ban burgers ; we VBP NN - friendly beef . To spur these NNS , we VBP to put a NN on NN , to incentivize polluters to invest in these solutions . Though air travel accounts for only a paltry 2 % of JJ NNS , whether or not NN NNS should fly consumes far more than 2 % of my NNP timeline . Unfortunately , sometimes doing NN means traveling great distances , and we do n’t always have the NN or luxury to take slower low - NN options . We have a job to do , after all . But RB still , a single scientist , or RB hundreds of NNS , choosing to never fly again is not VBG to VB the NN . Purchasing NN offsets for flights is a viable means of decarbonizing your air travel , for now . However , the JJ solution , pricing NN , requires policy NN . There is a JJ history of industry - funded “ deflection campaigns ” aimed to divert attention from JJ polluters and place the burden on individuals . Individual NN is important and something we should all champion . But appearing to force Americans to give up meat , or travel , or other things central to the lifestyle they ’ve chosen to live is politically dangerous : it plays RB into the hands of NN - NN deniers whose strategy tends to be to portray NN champions as freedom - hating totalitarians . The bigger issue is that focusing on individual choices IN air travel and beef consumption heightens the NN of losing sight of the gorilla in the room : civilization ’s reliance on fossil fuels for NN and transport overall , which accounts for roughly CD - thirds of JJ NN NNS . We VBP systemic NNS that will reduce everyone ’s NN footprint , whether or not they care . The good NN is we have tactics to bring environmentally friendly ( and non-lifestyle - disrupting ) options to fruition­ : pricing NN NNS and creating incentives for renewable NN and reduced consumption . By putting a NN on NN , NNS can actually make NN by reducing NNS , selling their services to corporations that are always looking for ways to cut costs . Never underestimate the resourcefulness of Americans when there ’s a dime to be made ! But a NN on NN needs to be designed such that marginalized communities most at NN from NN impacts are n’t adversely impacted economically as well . This is why we RB VBP JJ NN at every level , from local leaders to federal legislators all the NN up to the NNP . We VBP NN not just at the breakfast table , but at the ballot box as well . text: Ban Ki-moon gives up fight against NN NN In November 2009 , the ClimateGate erupted and JJ of us were convinced that the establishment of NN fear MD quickly collapse . I was imagining that it MD be as fast as the Velvet Revolution that began exactly 20 NNS earlier . So JJ NN skeptics were disillusioned by the speed . Now , 14 months later , things are beginning to move at the top places . Barack Obama has n’t mentioned any NN , NN , disruption , NN , or fossil fuels in his key annual talk – RB though he was talking for a whole hour . The Guardian just brought us another dose of good NN : The boss of the NNP Nations will stop his personal involvement in the battle to regulate the NN NN . Instead , he will try to achieve “ immediate gains ” in the field of clean NN and sustainable development . RB his U.N. colleagues have apparently understood that there ca n’t be any “ deal ” . Now , obviously , I have nothing whatsoever against clean or renewable NN sources . My only complaint is against huge subsidies of such things that VBD to be justified ideologically – by the deluded propaganda about NN disruption . NN up with Fresh Food that lasts with eFoodsDirect ( AD ) If this propaganda RB goes away , as Obama and Ki-moon indicate by their shifted attitudes , there is a hope that common sense and rational costs - and - benefits analysis will return to the NN industry and beyond . In the 2011 NN of the Union address , Obama RB mentioned oil and biofuels that MD replace it . That ’s surprising because RB NNP Gore has admitted that their support of biofuels was a JJ blunder . On the other hand , I can imagine that there will exist biofuels that actually make JJ sense . What I find important is that politicians will no longer promote nonsensical solutions by general slogans that are VBN on bad NN , fearmongering , and intimidation referring to insane planetary emergencies . We , the NN skeptics , have been warning against such irrational attitudes and we have been proved RB pretty much in all NNS . JJ - generation biofuels as well as NN trading has been showed to be a disaster while solar and wind NN turned out to be significant JJ problems in JJ NNS such as my homeland . Well , of course , I do n’t VB that the politicians will completely stop doing irrational things . But the amount of this bad policymaking MD simply decrease as the rats are gradually leaving the rotten and sinking bandwagon . Let us hope that JJ other politicians will follow in Obama ’s and Ki-moon ’s footsteps . As JJ more NNS regain their common sense and all plans to regulate NN evaporate , almost everyone will VB that the NNP is doing just fine and the NN skeptics have saved trillions of dollars . Will they be rewarded or will they remain the silent heroes who have just saved the civilization without any greed ? ;-) This article was posted : Friday , January 28 , 2011 at 5:37 am

text: There is no doubt that the NNP - CD NN is the NN of the moment , and a terribly serious NN at that , threatening not only JJ lives but RB the JJ economy . But it ’s not the only NN the NN is facing , and we ought not , while confronting the immediate menace , disregard the other immense threat looming over us : JJ NN . Rather , somewhat counterintuitively , we should use the current NN to learn some lessons and glean some insights about the other perils we will soon be facing . We ’re not suggesting that NN NN contributed to the NN outbreak ; there seems to be no direct link , although experts VBP a VBG NN MD accelerate pandemics of insect - borne diseases ( the NN is spread person to person ) . But the JJ response to this NN does show that the NN can come together to confront a shared threat . That MD bode well for addressing NN NN — if we treat it as seriously . The NN is putting a chokehold on JJ activity in hard - hit regions of the NN — NNP , Europe and here in the U.S. When factories and businesses are closed , workers and customers stay home ( here in California and in NNP NNP , by order of the governors ) . With few NNS traveling JJ distances , airlines slash flights . Sure , NNS and businesses continue to use NN , but not at the levels they did just a month ago . And that reduction in NN use in turn reduces fossil fuel consumption and NNS of NN dioxide and other NN gases into the atmosphere . Little of this will be RB - lasting . Once the epidemic subsides , JJ activity will resume and so , presumably , will NNS . But the NN offers opportunities for NN , and we ought to be mindful of them as the NN and the JJ NN play out . Businesses are learning how much of their workforce can do their jobs remotely , which offers guidance for how they might operate in the future with a lighter NN footprint . Consumers are undergoing a forced experiment in changed patterns of shopping and consumption . Congress and NNP NNP RB are negotiating a series of bailouts and other support packages to VB NNS and businesses survive . They should take this opportunity to press for NNS in how some of these industries operate . The airline industry , for instance , should be asked to do more to reduce its NN NNS , which have soared in recent NNS and will continue to rise as air travel itself is projected to increase . A September paper from the International Council on Clean Transportation VBD industry NNS to conclude that commercial air operations account for 2.4 % of JJ NN NNS from burning fossil fuels , and that industry NNS in 2018 were 32 % higher than five NNS before . CD available NNS - reducing alternative is the use of so - called sustainable aviation fuels , including biofuels , but they are more expensive than conventional jet fuel . And airline NNS can be pressured to adopt aggressive plans to replace older , higher - polluting planes . That MD be in line with the demand for increased fuel efficiency commitments that the Obama administration attached to its bailout package for the auto industry . Of course , extracting NN - friendly concessions will vary by the industry seeking bailout NN , so we wo n’t VB too prescriptive here . The main imperative for the NN is to keep NN policy in NN as it devises a plan to rescue the economy . But wait , you VBP . This is the NNP administration , which at best shrugs at the NN and ignores JJ NN . JJ enough , but Congress RB is involved , and it can place NN considerations on the table . Here ’s a good place to start : The NN should not be bailing out the oil and gas industry at a NN when we should be focusing on expanding production of renewable NN and the infrastructure to store and deliver it . In recent days , early NN scoffers — including the NN — have come RB to the reality that this NN is a deadly threat and have finally begun taking strong steps to address it . Yet JJ NN is a larger and longer - lasting threat to humankind . We have about a decade , according to the experts , to make significant reductions in NN NNS to avoid the worst ramifications of NN NN . The NN already is seeing the effects in longer and more severe droughts in some places , record flooding in others , stronger and more intense tropical storms and regional NN rises that are making parts of the word nearly uninhabitable . The NN confirms all this , as it has confirmed the spread and dangers from the novel NN . So maybe accepting the reality of NNP - CD will lead the administration to recognize the reality of NN NN and work with Congress to begin addressing it in meaningful ways .

text: The whole situation is intractable . Adversaries have locked horns and it is impossible to have a civilized debate . You are either for or against , JJ or wrong , good or evil . There is no room for anything in between . There is simply no NN to talk , the end is nigh . Now is the NN for NN , not words . Alarm bells are ringing everywhere . There is no doubt , the NN is important : This is about melting glaciers , withering landscapes , rising NN levels and starving polar bears . What always gets left out , however , are the steps already being taken to make sure less CO2 is released into the atmosphere . The things that make factories cleaner , lower automobile NNS or RB cut them altogether by VBG electric . In most NNS , such measures are brushed off by critics as " greenwashing . " Here are a couple of randomly chosen examples of steps already being taken : CD NNS ago , the German steel manufacturer Salzgitter started something it called its EnergyEfficiency project . Since then , it has saved a CD tons of CO2 , as well as consuming 3,300 Terajoule less NN each NN — enough to VB some 55,000 households . Another example is NNP NNP Ferries , the NN 's second - largest ferry operator . The NN is currently in the process of converting its fleet — which had consumed some 75 CD liters ( 20 CD gallons ) of diesel fuel annually — to battery NN . But why ? Because Governor Jay Inslee signed a law mandating it . But the head of the NN has RB VBN the NN is n't just about conforming to the JJ law . He VBZ it 's a good idea , adding that you do n't have to be an JJ activist to appreciate the fact that it means quieter boats , less pollution and more financial savings . More and more NNS are VBG green Just recently , during the latest COP25 JJ NN conference in Madrid , some 180 NNS RB committed themselves to ambitious JJ goals , pledging to cut NNS continuously with the aim of being NN neutral by 2050 at the latest . And these are n't JJ , niche NNS , but rather JJ JJ corporations IN the consumer goods producer Beiersdorf ; the NN 's largest beer producer , Ambev ; and the International Airline Group , Europe 's third - largest airline holding NN ( British Airways and Iberia ) . Such commitments have practically doubled the number of NNS now in the " Business Ambition for 1.5˚C : Our Only Future " alliance since it was founded in September of last NN . Admittedly , other things are RB happening , things that bewilder activists and realists alike . CD VBP only look to the disaster that is the German NN transition . JJ , the percentage of NN produced by renewables has gone up , but — according to the Federal Audit Office – — some € 160 CD ( $ 179 CD ) has RB devoured in the process . Despite such efforts , the German solar industry is practically nonexistent and things do n't look much better for the wind industry . In Germany , NNS prefer to argue about minimum distances between wind turbines and the next closest village , while our French neighbors negotiate the construction of six JJ nuclear NN plants . Read more : Germany shuts down atomic plant as nuclear phase - out enters final stretch What NN activists RB VBP Either NN : Is it — as NN activists ceaselessly tell us — JJ that nothing is RB happening ? Or have the topics of sustainability and JJ compatibility finally struck a note with NNS ? And if the latter , is it because they provide a good NNS strategy ? And what MD be wrong with that if it did ? Might it not RB make sense to look closer at just what NN activists VBP ? Take Luisa Neubauer , for instance , VBN here as the German Greta Thunberg , despite being a few NNS older than the Swedish teen ; or Carola Rackete , who is internationally VBN as the refugee - saving captain of the ship NNP Watch 3 , but MD prefer to be part of the Extinction Rebellion movement . Both women have now written books : Rackete called hers " Act : A Call to the Last Generation , " and Neubauer titled hers " The End of the NNP NNP . " Both books VBP straight to the heart of the matter — they are full of ideas for bans and penalties . The authors call for those who destroy nature to be tried for crimes against humanity . Yet , neither wastes words defending individual rights , arguing that individuals cannot be trusted to decide whether they are for or against NN protection . In interviews given after her book was published , Carola Rackete went further still : " Everything we do , or do n't do , props up the current NN . " That 's why civil disobedience is so " extremely urgent . " It quickly becomes clear that what these women are after is something much bigger than NN protection : They are at NN with the existing JJ NN , with free - NN economies , and with capitalism . And anyone who is opposed to that fight , or is of a JJ opinion , simply can not be JJ . Only those who are for radical NN protection are among the good , and only they own the truth . But anyone who so vehemently clamors for an JJ planned economy should take a quick look into the recent past . It MD seem that the disastrous NN of the environment in JJ East Germany MD be enough to illustrate just how ineffective planned systems are when it comes to sustainability and NN protection . So what now ? In such a heated environment — sorry for the pun — it seems there is no chance of having a rational debate . But we have to talk about how we are VBG to tackle this challenge , and it is becoming increasingly clear that the discussion has to take place between JJ generations — CD that has experienced NN , and another that is impatient . But apocalyptic scenarios prophesying the end of the NN wo n't lead anywhere . At the most , they will simply harden opposition among those of a JJ opinion . That MD be a shame , because we VBP the ideas that young NNS have to offer . We VBP their youthful nonchalance , their openness and their curiosity . The young VBP to show us that they can do things better than us — but they should RB let us come along on the journey , at least for a while .
