text: NN Reviews Generic Laws as Set by NNPS and Finds Less Restrictive Regulations MD Result in Savings of More than $ 100 CD WOONSOCKET , R.I. , July 7 / PRNewswire / -- NNPS struggling to pay for increasing NN care costs through their Medicaid programs can save more than $ 100 CD over the next several NNS by changing generic substitution laws to permit easier and faster substitutions of generics for brand medications , a JJ CVS Caremark ( NYSE : CVS ) has VBN . The NN , published in the July edition of NNP Affairs , looked at the generic substitution of simvastatin for cholesterol brand drug Zocor over six quarters beginning June 23 , 2006 , when Zocor 's patent expired . The review looked at how quickly Medicaid recipients moved to the generic equivalent medications under three JJ NN statutes – mandatory versus permissive substitution , with and without prior authorization , and with and without requiring patient approval for substitution . The generic substitutions discussed in the NN are for chemically identical generics for brand name drugs . " Requiring patients to provide consent prior to generic substitution led to an approximately 25 % reduction in generic substitution , " VBD Dr. William H. Shrank , the NN 's lead author , an Assistant Professor of Medicine at Harvard NNP School in the Division of Pharmacoepidemiology at Brigham and Women 's Hospital in Boston . During the six consecutive quarters reviewed , the NN determined that NNS MD have saved almost $ 20 CD if the substitution from Zocor to the chemically - identical simvatstatin were made more quickly for that CD medication . " This NN has important implications . We determined NNS can stem the rising cost of medications paid for by Medicaid programs by modifying statutes to make it easier to replace brand name medications with generics , " VBD Troyen A. Brennen , MD , MPH and Executive Vice NN and Chief JJ Officer of CVS Caremark . " There are JJ brand medications that will lose their patent protection over the next several NNS and , as a consequence , we will VB the introduction of generic equivalents for these brand medications . In particular , we can expect significant activity with the upcoming patent expirations of Lipitor , Plavix and Zyprexa over the next eighteen months . " The NN estimates NN Medicaid programs can save more than $ 100 CD on those three drugs alone by adopting regulations that allow pharmacists to make a NN following the patent expiration , without requiring direct patient approval . This is NN that policy makers can take immediately to save NN without affecting the quality of pharmacy care , " he VBD . Brennan VBD cost containment and finding ways to better manage increasing NN care costs is extremely important in the face of the current JJ NN and expected expansion of NN Medicaid programs resulting from federal NN care reform . The NN involved a review of Medicaid claims NNS between June 2006 and 2008 in 48 NNS and the District of Columbia . The NN published in NNP Affairs is the result of CVS Caremark 's previously announced three - NN collaboration with Harvard NNP and Brigham and Women 's Hospital to research pharmacy claims NNS to better understand patient behavior IN medication adherence and appropriate medication use . In addition , earlier this NN the NN launched a Behavior NNP Research Partnership with academic leaders from Carnegie Mellon NNP , Dartmouth College 's Tuck School of Business and the NNP of Pennsylvania 's NNP School and Wharton School of Business to develop insights into consumer actions IN NN challenges through the lens of behavioral economics and JJ marketing . CVS Caremark is undertaking these studies because patient non-adherence to essential chronic medications is widely recognized as a barrier to improving JJ NN and a NN of increasing JJ costs . Past studies show CD - quarter of NNS receiving prescriptions never fill their JJ prescription , and patients with chronic diseases such as diabetes and coronary artery NN adhere to their ongoing medication regimen about half of the NN . Non-adherence to essential medications is a frequent NN of preventable hospitalizations and patient illness , with costs to the U.S. NN care NN estimated at about $ 300 CD annually . CVS Caremark is the largest pharmacy NN care provider in the NNP NNPS . Through our integrated offerings across the entire spectrum of pharmacy care , we are uniquely positioned to provide greater access , to engage plan members in behaviors that improve their NN and to lower overall NN care costs for NN plans , plan sponsors and their members . CVS Caremark is a NN leader in mail order pharmacy , retail pharmacy , specialty pharmacy , and retail clinics , and is a leading provider of Medicare Part D Prescription Drug Plans . As CD of the country 's largest pharmacy benefits managers ( PBMs ) , we provide access to a network of more than 64,000 pharmacies , including approximately 7,000 CVS / pharmacy ® stores that provide unparalleled service and capabilities . Our clinical expertise includes CD of the industry 's most comprehensive NN management programs . General NN about CVS Caremark is available through the NNP 's Web site at http://info.cvscaremark.com.

text: NN NN is expected to affect every country in the NN , but its impact will not be felt equally across all regions and some will be worse hit than others because of a range of JJ threats . Developing NNS , places with widespread poverty , and NNS with ineffective governments sometimes face the gravest risks from the changing NN , and are usually poorly equipped to find ways to prepare for and prevent JJ threats . Measuring the future impact of NN NN is very challenging , because NNS ’ NN NN projections cannot be completely exact and because there are JJ JJ factors that come into play such as the NN of extreme NN events and rising NNS . There are other non-climatic factors that RB determine how severely a city or country will be impacted by NN NN . Niall Smith , who analyzes regions ’ NN NN vulnerability for the JJ NN consulting firm Maplecroft , tells NN that it ’s RB necessary to weigh in what ’s happening politically and socially in a region to figure out if the country can prepare . “ The places with the least level of JJ development are certainly in line to feel the impacts with the greatest degree , partially just due to their geographic fate — or their location — but more so VBN on the socio- JJ and governance factors , ” VBZ Smith . JJ developing NNS are RB uniquely vulnerable , VBZ Kelly Levin of the NNP Resources Institute , “ their livelihoods are dependent on natural resources . And if those natural resources are affected by NN NN , their ability to feed their families and make a living is significantly impacted . ” To VB a sense of the challenges JJ regions are facing , NNP spoke to experts about six NNS and cities will be be particularly affected by NN NN . Lagos is at “ extreme ” NN on Maplecroft ’s NNP NNP Vulnerability Index . This is especially concerning because its population is expanding rapidly , and it is considered to be a major JJ engine for the region . The governor boasted that Lagos had reached a GDP of $ 136 CD in 2017 , which is about a third of the entire country ’s GDP . The city is RB a major transportation hub , with multiple ports and a major international airport and is a regional hub for high tech industry . Lagos has “ transformed ” over the last 18 NNS , Lamido Sanusi , a JJ central bank governor , VBD the Financial last NN In terms of roads , in terms of infrastructure , in terms of a general investment environment , in terms of security , the NN has given NNS a greater opportunity to thrive . ” Lagos is RB at a disadvantage because it ’s considered to be CD of the fastest growing cities in the NN , which will put a “ strain on infrastructure and resources , ” according to Smith . Its population is projected to nearly double over the next 15 NNS , growing from its current population of 13,463,420 to 23,418,770 . In the future , Smith warns that Lagos residents will RB experience more hot days and droughts . NN NN MD threaten the city ’s economy . The city is especially vulnerable because it ’s located on the Gulf of Guinea , VBZ Levin . As NN levels rise , it ’s likely to affect VB coastal erosion and contaminate potable NN . This MD harm local agriculture in the countryside and damage the country ’s fishing industry , which MD be dire in a country with “ tremendous ” poverty , Levin VBZ . “ You MD VB more and more NNS moving in from the countryside because of loss of JJ opportunity into a city IN Lagos , which MD make the whole situation more challenging , ” Levin VBZ . If Lagos struggles , it MD seriously reduce JJ opportunity in the region . NN NN can be a “ threat multiplier , ” VBZ Christina Chan , the director of the NNP Resources Institute ’s NN resilience practice . This is especially JJ for Haiti . The island nation is located in the “ Atlantic Hurricane Basin , ” which means that it is vulnerable to hurricanes . In comparison to other projections on NN NN , NNS are less certain about the link between NN NN and hurricane frequency and intensity , but studies have suggested that hurricanes are likely getting wetter and more intense due to NN NN . Since Haiti is a very poor country , recovering from natural disasters and preparing for future storms is especially challenging . The devastation in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake and CD ’s Hurricane Matthew was compounded by the country ’s lack of disaster preparedness . The disasters were major setbacks for the country ’s JJ development ; the $ 8 CD NN tag of recovering from the earthquake surpassed the country ’s GDP , according to the Council on Foreign Relations . The landscape is RB heavily deforested and mountainous , which means it will be more susceptible to landslides . According to Levin , Haiti will RB struggle because the population is dependent on agriculture , and rising NN levels mean that salt NN MD contaminate freshwater . The NNP Nations warns that rising NN levels MD VB saltwater to permeate farmland and freshwater supplies . “ There ’s certainly a JJ portion of Haitians that are dependent on agriculture for their livelihoods and income . And if you have overall patterns of rainfall declines as NNS rise , certainly that MD impact farmers , ” Levin VBZ . NNS with weak institutions and governments are likely to find it especially difficult to adapt to NN NN , VBZ Smith . Since civil NN broke out in Yemen in 2015 , hundreds of thousands of NNS have been killed directly as a result of the conflict , but RB due to the subsequent famine , poor sanitation and a lack of clean NN , according to the NNP Nations . About 1.6 CD NNS in Yemen are living with malnutrition in 2019 , according to the UN . Both NN and NN NN will make NN shortages and famine more likely . According to a Untied Nations report , most contemporary famines result from armed conflict and are worsened by natural disasters . As the report explains , “ Parties to the conflict MD use food as a weapon , cutting off food supplies , destroying systems of food production and distribution , and stealing food aid . Agricultural production falls , which both limits the availability of food and cuts off JJ rural houses from their livelihoods . And with higher levels of poverty , JJ families cannot afford the food they VBP , especially at inflated prices . ” Malaria is RB becoming more common in Yemen , and MD be exacerbated by rising NNS . As Yemen has a JJ coast , it ’s RB vulnerable to rising NN levels , according to Levin . An area to watch , VBZ Levin , “ Whenever you ’re thinking about a country in that region … [ is ] the issue of rising NNS impacting NN scarcity , especially when it ’s exacerbated by NN management challenges and expanding population . ” As other NNS work to curb their oil consumption , it MD be a mixed blessing for Yemen , according to Levin . While lower NNS are believed to be necessary to limit NN NN , it MD RB reduce demands for CD of Yemen ’s major imports — oil — which MD impact Yemen ’s economy , Levin VBZ . The Philippines faces a high NN of natural disasters , including earthquakes , tsunamis , floods , and especially hurricanes . Manila , which is located along the coast , is RB densely populated , which makes it more difficult to evacuate , requires more JJ services and makes it more challenging to rebuild after a disaster . Poor infrastructure , including ineffective drainage and sanitation systems , has been blamed for the toll of floods in the city , including a 2009 flood that submerged 80 % of the city . However , Chan VBZ that the Philippines is in fact on the “ forefront of NN ” to NN NN , and have designated part of their budget to making their country ’s agricultural sector and infrastructure more resilient , and preparing to respond to future disasters . For instance , the NN launched a Flood Management Master Plan for Metro Manila in 2012 , which aims to manage future floods by modernizing and building JJ pumping stations and investing in other infrastructure along waterways , according to the Asian Infrastructure investment Bank . The Philippines have created a NNP NNP Commission , which implements programs such as the National NNP NNP NNP Plan , a JJ - term strategy for prioritizing “ food security , NN sufficiency , ecosystem and JJ stability , JJ security , NN smart industries and services , sustainable NN , NN and capacity development . ” Rising NN levels mean that Kiribati MD be wiped off the map entirely in the coming decades . The islands have RB purchased 5,000 acres of land in Fiji in NN they VBP to relocate . While Kitribati , IN JJ other NNS , is taking steps to prepare for NN NN , the Pacific island nation must RB reckon with the fact that “ for their island , NN will have its limits , ” VBZ Chan . The islands are only six NNS above NN level and sit upon a NN of atolls and reef islands , which means that rising NN levels are a threat to the nation ’s existence . This vulnerability has RB spurred Kiribati to take serious steps in NN mitigation . Kiribati has allied itself with other vulnerable island NNS to advocate for NN to fight NN NN , and taken other measures such as planting mangrove trees and building NN walls . Meanwhile , Levin VBZ , rising NN levels are likely to contaminate the island ’s freshwater and harm its soil , which is not especially fertile for agriculture to begin with . The island ’s vital fishing industry is RB more vulnerable , as NN NNS leads to shifts in the ocean , including coral bleaching ; damage to the structure of reefs ; marine “ heat waves ” ; and other conditions that force marine NN to move north . IN JJ of the other places on this list , the NNP Arab Emirates is facing JJ risks due to its location . IN Yemen and other neighboring NNS , the UAE is facing an “ extreme NN ” of NN stress , according to Smith , and will VB to spend a lot more NN on cooling . Unlike JJ other NNS facing these threats , however , the UAE is wealthier and is able to make sophisticated investments to blunt the impact of NN NN . For instance , the UAE is working to produce its own fresh NN , build NN - controlled spaces , investments in green NN , and developing crops that can withstand hotter NNS . However , according to Levin , it remains to be seen whether these adaptations will reach Yemen ’s entire population , because the country faces rampant inequality . “ The question is , will adequate investments be made in NN , and will the poorest be able to enjoy the same kind of comforts as the rest of the population , ” Levin VBZ . “ You can look at the face of a GDP of a given country . But that RB masks tremendous inequality . It ’s hard to necessarily VB that CD country ’s in such a better position to withstand NN impacts . ”

text: " NN NN and sustainability were not easy topics back then , " remembers Hanno Franke , thinking back almost 25 NNS and almost sounding as if he ’s trying to defend himself . The SC Freiburg marketing director has been at the club since the mid-1990s , a NN when the Sport - Club from the Black Forest became the JJ Bundesliga club to begin taking measures to protect the environment . " The club was n’t sure of its own identity , its own DNA , " Franke explains . " But RB then , the city of Freiburg took sustainability very seriously so it seemed logical that we as a football club should VB involved as well . JJ NNS advised us against it . Back then , some of our advisers warned us about being ' too green . ' " CD of the main ideas was the installation of solar panels on the roof of the Schwarzwaldstadion ’s JJ south stand ( pictured above ) . It 's common measure by today 's standards , with JJ Bundesliga clubs producing their own solar NN , but in the mid-1990s , Freiburg were ahead of the curve and faced stiff opposition . " Looking back , the club showed a great deal of courage and conviction and laid the groundwork for everything that followed , " VBZ Franke , with barely concealable pride . text: The NN 2017 was a record - breaking NN for extreme NN and JJ catastrophes since records started to be kept in the 19th century . The Arctic experienced NNS up to 70 degree F above normal . JJ NNS were baked in unusual heatwaves killing thousands . Incidents of droughts , extreme typhoons in the Pacific and hurricanes in the Atlantic , flash floods , and wildfires erupted daily in international NN headlines . As recent as 2014 , the NNP Meteorological Organization ( WMO ) , following an analysis of NNP satellite footage of NN dioxide movement IN the NN , concluded that our NN NN has entered “ unchartered territory at frightening speed . ” But 2017 was RB the NN when the statistical figures came in for CD . The WMO reported that CO2 concentrations in the atmosphere rose at record speed . Currently it is at its highest level in 800,000 NNS . If anyone held any doubt that NN NN is unreal , a fiction or fantasy , 2017 should have been wake up call to the most obstinate denialist . NNS have warned about our current days of NN for several decades . For those who jumped on the bandwagon NNS ago when atmospheric and geological NNS voiced serious concerns about JJ NN and its dire consequences , it was a NN with no huge surprises , except for the rapid acceleration of NN trends . It is NN that NNS , and more crucially our entire NN , to accept the fact that NN NN is the single most important threat to humanity ’s survival . Certainly , a nuclear confrontation with North Korea or NNP is a horrifying scenario that MD eliminate tens or RB hundreds of millions of NNS . However , it is within humanity ’s means to avoid nuclear NN . On the other hand it is highly improbable whether we can do much to deter NN NN . Natural forces are far beyond our technological NN - how and methods to VB powerful planetary forces regardless of how JJ efforts to advance geoengineering or a dramatic shift to renewable energies are made . Perhaps it will slow the pace of JJ NN a little , but it too has its own destructive blowback . The NNP ’s history is a JJ story of numerous NNS birthing , evolving and eventually VBG extinct . There is no manifest destiny for our NN . There is no divine promise that humanity MD not in the future follow in the footsteps of the dinosaurs . Our lives are not transcendent to Nature nor the multitude of other natural forces , animals , plants , microbes and other NN forms and molecules upon which our existence depends . This is a simple truth we must learn . And it must be learned quickly and without further delay . In a July issue of NNP NNP Magazine , journalist David Wallace - Wells published a worst NN , doomsday scenario of NN NN ’s impact upon JJ society and the environment before the end of this century . His essay , “ The Uninhabitable NNP , ” was VBN upon JJ private interviews with unnamed NNS who were willing to voice their deeper concerns about catastrophic events and eroding conditions humanity will face unless a concerted JJ response to reduce NN gases is not launched immediately . Aside from several of Wallace - Wells ’ factual errors , this was the JJ featured article to appear in a mainstream publication that focused on NN NN ’s darker side . It became the most read article in NNP NNP Magazine ‘s history . However , earlier in 2003 , Cambridge NNP astrophysicist and philosopher Martin Rees released his influential Our Final Hour warning that the pace of humanity ’s destructive activities presents a 50:50 chance for our civilization to survive past the end of the 21st century . Carcinogenic and unhealthy foods and high levels of deadly toxic chemicals in common everyday NNS are only minor risks compared to JJ other postmodern technologies impacting our lives . NN NN , combined with the genetic engineering of JJ viruses , synthetic biology , artificial intelligence , and rape of the NN for its last remaining natural resources , according to Rees , is a recipe for certain disaster and will likely end in the extinction of our NN . While JJ NNS and most of the general NN who acknowledge the facts about anthropogenic NN NN continue to hold enormous blind faith on JJ ingenuity and modern technology to prevent JJ NN ’s “ end game , ” Rees and a distinguished , multi- disciplinary consortium of NNS at the Cambridge Center for the NNP of Existential Risks acknowledge a darker side behind our over - reliance upon technological solutions –nuclear NN , geoengineering , genetic manipulation of nature , etc . Rees ’s 50:50 survival prediction was largely ignored after its publication over a decade ago . Nobody wants to accept that our survival is predicated upon a flip of a coin . Today , his predictions are being reevaluated and his supporters are increasing . And this is why Wallace - Wells ’ NNP NNP Magazine ‘s article is so important . There are more than ample reasons to fear the consequences of NN NN on our NN , food security , our livelihoods , well - being , and the survival of future generations , including our NNS . Extinction is forever , whether it be in a hundred , as the more pessimistic NNS suggest , or a thousand NNS or more . It is only a matter of NN before killer heat waves become the norm , chemical - VBN industrial agriculture collapses , national economies are devastated , JJ plagues and NN epidemics emerge , and NN and resource conflicts and wars increase . All of these have been previously predicted over the NNS , and each is already starting to cast its shadow over the NN . Fear combined with hope is a powerful motivating factor to embrace NN in personal habits and lifestyle . Therefore , it is critical today for humanity to become afraid , to become intensely afraid without becoming paralyzed . We condemn ourselves only by our failure to wake up while clinging to faux optimism , and by refusing to take upon ourselves the appropriate actions when confronted with an immediate emergency . NN NN NN poses certain obstacles difficult for the average person to accept . Perhaps most evident is that the NN and predictions appear too abstract . They can seem too foreign and impersonal . The calving of an enormous NN sheet in Antarctica or rapid Himalayan glacier melt do not set off alarm bells that threaten our cozy lives in JJ and European cities and suburbs . The events are too distant . We VBP that NN levels are rising . Everyone in Miami is aware of this fact because flooded areas in the city are now commonplace . The citizens of the Maldives and Solomon Islands certainly VBP this because their nations are already sinking under rising NN levels . But to imagine PRP ’s home or condominium along the coast being partially submerged permanently in the Atlantic Ocean is a NN too far off to VB about . Consequently , real estate developers continue their frenzy to build more residences up and down the Florida coast , and NNS continue to flock to the Sunshine NNP to purchase a sunny place to retire . It is almost obscene to imagine that four of the top ten cities witnessing the largest influx of migrants within the NNP NNPS are RB the most compromised by more immediate NN NN and extreme NN conditions : Houston ( No. 1 ) , Miami ( No. 2 ) , Phoenix ( No. 7 ) and Orlando ( No. CD ) . In August 2017 , Hurricane Harvey submerged over 100,000 homes throughout the greater Houston metropolitan area . While the storm itself cannot be attributed to humanity ’s contribution to JJ NN , the hurricane ’s intensity and NN is certainly related . Rising NN levels and warmer NN NN off the Texas coast — 7.2 degrees F above average making it the hottest spot of ocean NN in the NN — are the CD major factors that made Harvey so catastrophic and deadly . And similar extreme tropic storms are only VBG to increase as the NNP gets warmer . As the NN ’s NN heats further and NN levels rise , climatic events become increasingly more extreme . Consequently our lives become more stressed , miserable , insecure and uncertain . Individually , nobody can initiate the kind of grand massive NN in collective humanity ’s relationship to the environment being demanded today . However , each of us can make determined and immediate NNS in our personal lives and repair our personal rapport with the NN , nature , the ecology IN our homes , neighborhoods and towns . No honor is gained by sitting and waiting for NN to take concerted NN to lessen NN gas NNS and overhaul the federal regulatory NN to hold private industries and polluters accountable . The corruption of NNP is beyond reform because NN has itself become a private enterprise . Likewise , Americans are waking up to the realization that their votes are useless . Those who VBP to VB the most–elected officials and legislators , corporate CEOs and Chairmen , professional institutions – will not find the solutions until it is too late . In the meantime , they refuse to VB the problem . And this is clearly evident by the fact that the fossil fuel industry is expanding rather than receding . This chapter will lay out the fundamental problem humanity faces as NN NN and JJ NN accelerate . Although a popular awareness of NN NN is growing rapidly , most NNS still have difficulty connecting the dots between dramatic NN - related crises and calamities happening in far off regions of the NN and the impact these very same events have upon their personal lives . Therefore , I will be presenting the NN NN in simple lay language , providing crucial examples , in order to make JJ NN a more personal affair . Unless the threats the NNP faces are understood and perceived as a threat to our personal well - being and that of our immediate families , loved ones and friends , the constructive , necessary NN so direly needed will not unfold . Nevertheless , we must begin with ourselves because each of us possesses in her or his NN the capacity to live in harmony with NN and the greater whole of Nature . And then we must serve as an example of a conscientious , ecological lifestyle to those we meet . In August 2017 , the 900 - plus NN tanker Christophe de Margerie set sail from NNP ’s North NNP to South Korea . The cruise ’s novelty was that for the JJ NN in recorded history a sailing vessel crossed the Arctic ’s Northern NNP Route without the NN for icebreakers . The ship traveled freely , unencumbered across the broken , melting NN fields . This JJ incident regarding a tanker carrying natural gas half NN IN the NN MD seem incidental and insignificant , barely newsworthy . But for climatologists and Arctic ecologists it was an unexpected and disturbing event . It was another indication that the NN is racing faster towards an NN free Arctic . It was RB a warning that JJ NN is accelerating beyond expectations . Back in 2013 , the NNP of California was predicting that ships MD be incapable of traveling freely across the North Pole before 2050 . However , the Christophe ’s passage over the Arctic ’s southern frontier in under seven days holds a record . And this voyage MD have never been possible without the acceleration of anthropogenic NN NN . As the Russian vessel made its NN across the crown of the NN , at the opposite pole another surprising event occurred . On July 12 , 2017 , an iceberg , approximately 2,200 square NNS or roughly the size of the NN of Delaware , broke free from the Larsen C icesheet in Western Antarctica . This was the third gigantic Antarctic icesheet to collapse since 1995 , and the largest to date . Glaciologists were startled because the speed of the sheet ’s disintegration was miscalculated . Although the break , commonly VBN as “ calving , ” had been predicted several NNS prior , it was the suddenness that was disturbing . A week later , glaciologists ’ predictions were proven wrong a second NN . It had not been a clean split as calculated earlier . Instead , IN a stone hitting an auto ’s windshield , the break triggered a network of fissures indicating that the entire icesheet was quickly fragmenting and more sheets MD be calving in the near future . Antarctica is often viewed as the last place on NNP that will be touched by JJ NN due to JJ activity . However , CD observed a record low of NN NN , according to the NNP of NNP , and 2020 is now targeted as the turnaround point when the degradation of the southern polar icesheets will be directly the result of JJ activity . Already , atmospheric NNS in the Antarctic have been rising annually by 4 - 6 C . As NN seasons lengthen , NN sheets melt and calf faster and eventually the shelves thin further and disappear . For the twenty - JJ century , these CD geological events , and JJ others , are indicative of the greatest threat to humanity : JJ NN and NN NN . For the JJ NN in JJ history , our NN has entered an era of extraordinary and anxious uncertainty . JJ are bewildered when they hear about the loss of an Antarctic NN sheet , prolonged droughts , NNS reaching above 50 degree Celsius , flash floods , and uncontrollable wildfires . What does it mean when we hear that CD was the third NN in a row to set a JJ record for average JJ NNS ? Is this simply a fluke ? An aberration in the usual NN patterns we have become accustomed to ? Will it continue or end ? The international scientific community is nearly unanimous in confirming that JJ NN is accelerating and JJ activity is its primary driving force . There is RB near unanimous certainty the course we are following to reach catastrophic benchmarks is inevitable and completely outside our civilization ’s NN . Those NNS who resist the international consensus are far and few between . The majority of dissenters lack a professional background in the NNP and NN sciences , climatology , glaciology and other disciplines directly associated with measuring and observing NNS in the atmosphere and the NNP ’s geology . For several decades , NNS the NN over have been running simulated NN models repeatedly to determine whether increased NN is anthropogenic or caused by JJ activity . And repeatedly whenever JJ - generated NN gases –CO2 , methane , nitrous oxide , NN vapor , dust , etc. – are removed from their equations , they are unable to account for the sudden rise in the NNP ’s NN as the result of natural phenomena alone . Already the NNP is warmer than it has been for the last 120,000 NNS . However , when these same models introduce NN gases into their equations , they accurately correlate with the actual NN trends being witnessed . JJ - term , 90 % of planetary NN is linked to the actions of our NN . The remaining CD % , according to Konrad Steffen , director of the Swiss Polar Institute , is “ unexplained . It is not uncommon for climatologists to underestimate the swiftness of NN - related events . The statistical and computational models to portend timelines for certain NN tipping points , although highly sophisticated , are unable to account for all variables and trends , particularly unforeseeable catastrophes such as mammoth biomass NNS from wildfires and other natural and JJ calamities . For example , researchers MD not predictable calculate the explosion of BP ’s Deep Horizon facility that discharged up to 520,000 tons of methane into the atmosphere , the equivalent of burning upwards to 3.1 CD barrels of crude oil . Consequently dire findings are either VBN wanting or too sober as JJ observations upgrade earlier forecasts . Very soon the Arctic region will be NN free throughout the NN . Conservatively the Arctic will lose all its NN during the warmest months before 2030 . We still do n’t VB precisely JJ of the JJ - term consequences to the polar region and the NN ’s biosystems once this tipping point is reached . However , there are approximately four CD NNS living along the Arctic Circle , including hundreds of thousands of indigenous NNS . Very likely , most of the coastal communities will be forced to migrate in the near future as shorelines dependent upon NN , freezing NNS and colder seasons start to crumble and disappear . Acceleration is RB exasperated by the thawing permafrost and tundra , and the massive release of methane and nitrous oxide , in the Arctic North . In point of fact , the polar North is collapsing . The loss of the Arctic ’s albedo , the white NN of NN that reflects the NNP ’s radiation back into NN , has already passed its tipping point . For as RB as NNS have been on the third NN from the NNP , we will never return to a NN when polar bears and seals thrived on frozen ocean surfaces . We can no longer prevent the Western Antarctic icesheets , including the Larsen and Ross sheets , from slipping away into the dark oceanic waters . The rush of fresh NN from melting glaciers in Greenland are beyond our technological means to prevent the disruption in the Atlantic Ocean ’s conveyor belt . VBN upon satellite NN feeds , the Greenland sheets , according to David Barber at the NNP of Manitoba , are now melting six hundred times faster than the current modeling trends suggest . Similarly , due to JJ complex and unknown factors , it is exceedingly difficult to ascertain exactly how high the oceans will rise if all Antarctic NN melts . For example , CD of the largest Antarctic icesheets rests on solid ground below NN level . On the CD hand , this makes the sheet far more unstable and geologists continue to try to determine its JJ impact following its last breath . Nevertheless the loss of the Ross icesheet in West Antarctica alone MD raise NN levels CD - 13 NNS ( 3 - 4 meters ) . In 2014 , NNP ’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory at the NNP of California at Irvine determined that the loss of the West Antarctic sheet is unstoppable . The circulation of the ocean ’s warmer waters beneath the NN continues to thin and melt the shelf . No technology nor RB a drastic reduction in NN gas NNS can prevent it . As if a warhead missile had already been launched , we can only sit and wait to experience the consequences befalling us upon impact . For JJ NNS , NNS were not terribly concerned about a rapid melt of Antarctic icesheets . The southern pole has always been thought to be the last place on NN to experience JJ NN . For the past 40 NNS , winter NN has actually increased –until recently . In CD , NNP of NNP researchers noted a perfect storm of conditions that , if repeated annually , will increase Antarctic NN melts and possibly trend towards declining NN buildup during the winter months . CD of the causes the NN NNS identified was a NN in El Nino patterns that are now reaching the Antarctic . In NNP 2014 , NNP Central provided a probable scenario of JJ land lost due to a CD NN increase in NN levels . Approximately 28,800 square NNS of land mass MD disappear with rising waters and force the dislocation of over 12 CD NNS , primarily along the US eastern seaboard . Twenty - seven cities in Florida MD be the most seriously affected . The report determined that the cost of lost property MD be upwards to $ 950 billion–a very conservative figure . The majority of the loss MD be in the southern NNS but RB a third in NNP NNP and NNP Jersey . The complete loss of 5 CD cubic NNS of NN now blanketing the NNP , including JJ mountain glaciers , MD raise NN levels by 216 NNS . San Francisco Bay Area MD be a cluster of JJ islands . Along with Los Angeles and San Diego , the NNP East Coast MD vanish . Bye bye London , Venice , Netherlands and most of Denmark . From Bangladesh across Southeast Asia to the Cardamom Mountains in Cambodia , only JJ islets MD remain . Mt Fuji MD remain as a standing volcano bulging monolithically out of the Pacific . Four out of five Australians MD be displaced and vast regions of Africa MD be uninhabitable . NNS are hopeful that a complete NN free NN is over a thousand NNS down the stretch . But without doubt humanity has entered uncharted territory on the geological map . Our technological tools and modeling systems , albeit highly sophisticated , are still incapable of the daunting task to establish precise timelines . Unpredictable events and catastrophes affecting feedback loops , such as wildfires , volcanic eruptions , oil fires or industrial plant explosions — such as the Arkema chemical plant explosion near Houston after Hurricane Harvey — and the numerical increase in extreme NN events cannot be accurately calculated into NN gas simulations . Harvey ’s rainfall is estimated to have been the worst in US history and the most devastating storm to hit Houston . Nineteen trillion gallons of NN . For five days , the “ capitol ” of NNP ’s fossil fuel industry was flooded with torrential rains and wave surges , shutting down and damaging oil refineries and chemical plants along Texas ’ eastern coast . Over CD CD pounds of toxic pollutants and NN gases were released . Such events fall outside the realm of computerized simulations and cannot be accurately included in predictive NN models . For this reason , scientific conclusions are often far more conservative than the actual NN of the NN . Therefore we must start to realize that there is no precedent on the NNP ’s 4.6 CD NN geological timeline to serve as a reliable baseline to accurately calculate NN - related events in the Anthropocene Age .

text: The 2021 NNP Conference on NNP & NNP NNP with a special focus on NNP Justice , will convene at the margin of the COP26 UN NN NN conference . The aim of the conference is to support and showcase Nationally Determined Contributions ( NDCs ) to the Paris Agreement which are ambitious , VBN on the principles of justice and equity , and promote and protect NN . It will RB mobilize the rapidly growing movement of NN professionals IN the NN who are now driving ambitious NN NN . The conference will be organized by the NNP NNP Organization ( WHO ) and by the NNP NNP and NNP Alliance ( GCHA ) , in close collaboration with Glasgow Caledonian NNP and its Centre for NNP Justice , with the UK NNP Alliance on NNP NNP , and other partners . The NN 2020 will VB the Paris Agreement come to NN . At its heart , the Paris Agreement is about caring for NNS and protecting them from an uncertain and increasingly unsafe future . Everyone has the NN to a healthy environment , free of pollution and its harmful consequences . Over 100 governments have already indicated they will update their national NN plans to the Paris Agreement ( VBN as Nationally Determined Contributions , NDCs ) , and these enhanced NN plans aim to include all vital sectors , including the NN sector . The same JJ activities that are destabilizing the NNP ’s NN RB contribute directly to poor NN . For example , the main driver of NN NN , fossil fuel combustion , RB contributes about 2/3 of JJ exposure to outdoor air pollution , which causes over 4 CD deaths a NN . Including indoor air pollution brings the total to over 7 CD deaths worldwide every NN – about 1 in every 8 deaths . The overall cost to JJ wellbeing , and to economies , is enormous . Air pollution alone costs an estimated US $ 5.11 trillion in welfare losses globally each NN . In the 15 NNS with the highest NN gas NNS , the NN impacts of air pollution are estimated to cost more than 4 % of their GDP . JJ concern over the NN impacts of air pollution is an increasing driver of JJ movements for NN on NN NN and overall JJ protection . Meeting the Paris goals MD result in NN gains which are twice as JJ as the costs of the mitigation measures from improved air quality alone . The NN gains of NN NN VBP well beyond air quality . They range from more sustainable diets and food systems addressing the rising burden of NN associated with overweight and obesity , to urban transport systems that facilitate walking and cycling , and bringing NN gains from increased physical activity . Weighing in both the impacts of NN - damaging business - as - usual policies and the massive NN co-benefits of ambitious NN policy , drives NN policies that are more ambitious and NN - promoting . The NNP Conference on NNP & NNP NNP will bring together a range of key actors in JJ NN and NN NN policy in order to incorporate JJ NN and NN justice considerations in the UN NN negotiations . It will highlight the initiatives , policies and cross-sectoral collaborations that are driving ambitious and healthy Nationally Determined Contributions to the Paris Agreement in the lead - up to COP26 . The conference will be organized by the NNP NNP Organization - convening its 4th NNP Conference on NNP and NNP - and by the NNP NNP and NNP Alliance - convening its 8th NNP NNP and NNP Summit - in close collaboration with the Glasgow Caledonian NNP and its Centre for NNP Justice , the UK NNP Alliance on NNP NNP and other partners . The overarching theme of the Conference will be Healthy and Ambitious Nationally Determined Contributions to the Paris Agreement , and will include sessions on the NN co-benefits of a broad range of NN policies , including clean NN policies ; air quality measures ; subsidy reform ; smart agriculture and sustainable food systems ; educational and civil society involvement ; nature - VBN solutions and others . A series of WHO - led initiatives , NN - studies and workshops throughout 2020 will feed into the outcomes of the JJ NN & NN conference and the COP26 UN NN conference . • Publication : NN in the NDCs - a WHO Review

text: In eosinophilic esophagitis ( e- o - sin - o - FILL - ik uh - sof - uh - JIE - tis ) , a type of white NN cell ( eosinophil ) builds up in the lining of the tube that connects your mouth to your stomach ( esophagus ) . This buildup , which is a reaction to foods , allergens or acid reflux , can inflame or injure the esophageal tissue . Damaged esophageal tissue can lead to difficulty swallowing or VB food to VB stuck when you swallow . Eosinophilic esophagitis is a chronic JJ NN NN . It has been identified only in the past CD decades , but is now considered a major NN of digestive NN ( gastrointestinal ) illness . Research is ongoing and will likely lead to revisions in the diagnosis and treatment of eosinophilic esophagitis . • Food getting stuck in the esophagus after swallowing ( impaction ) • Chest NN that is often centrally located and does not respond to antacids • Food getting stuck in the esophagus after swallowing ( impaction ) When to VB a NN Seek immediate JJ attention if you experience chest NN , especially if you RB have shortness of breath or jaw or arm NN . These MD be NNS of a heart attack . Make an appointment with your NN if you experience severe or frequent eosinophilic esophagitis NNS . If you take over - the - counter medications for heartburn more than twice a week , VB your NN . Eosinophils are a normal type of white NN cells present in your digestive tract . However , in eosinophilic esophagitis , you have an allergic reaction to an outside substance . The reaction MD occur as follows : • Reaction of the esophagus . The lining of your esophagus reacts to allergens , such as food or pollen . • Multiplication of eosinophils . The eosinophils multiply in your esophagus and produce a NN that causes inflammation . • Damage to esophagus . Inflammation can lead to scarring , narrowing and formation of excessive fibrous tissue in the lining of your esophagus . • Dysphagia and impaction . You MD have difficulty swallowing ( dysphagia ) or have food become stuck when you swallow ( impaction ) . • Additional NNS . You MD have other NNS , such as chest NN or stomach NN . There has been a significant increase in numbers of NNS diagnosed with eosinophilic esophagitis in the past decade . At RB , researchers thought this was due to an increase in awareness among doctors and greater availability of tests . However , studies now suggest the NN is becoming increasingly common , parallel to the increase in asthma and allergy . The following NN factors are associated with eosinophilic esophagitis : • NN . NNS who live in a cold or dry NN are more likely than those in other climates to be diagnosed with eosinophilic esophagitis . • Season . You 're more likely to be diagnosed between the spring and fall , probably because levels of pollen and other allergens are higher and NNS are more prone to be outdoors . • Sex . Eosinophilic esophagitis is more common in males than in females . • Family history . Doctors VBP eosinophilic esophagitis MD run in the family ( have a genetic component ) . If your family members have eosinophilic esophagitis , you have a greater chance of being diagnosed . • Allergies and asthma . If you have food or JJ allergies , asthma , atopic dermatitis or a chronic respiratory NN , you 're more likely to be diagnosed with eosinophilic esophagitis . • Age . Originally , eosinophilic esophagitis was thought to be a childhood NN , but now it is VBN to be common in adults as well . The NNS differ somewhat between NNS and adults . In some NNS , eosinophilic esophagitis can lead to the following : • Scarring and narrowing of the esophagus . This makes it difficult to swallow and more likely that you will have food VB stuck . • Damage to the esophagus . Because of inflammation of the esophagus , endoscopy can VB perforation or tears in the tissue that lines the esophagus . Tearing can RB occur in connection with retching that some NNS experience when they VBP food stuck in the esophagus .

text: Panel : Anunnaki religions , Zionist - Jesuit - Hidden controller governments , NN JJ - industrial complex end in defeat by Lamb ( Messiah ) and Universal fleet VANCOUVER , BC – In this NewsInsideOut.com Panel , author and hermeneuticist Peter Kling and futurist Alfred Lambremont Webre explore the impacts of the Pope Francis Bergoglio ’s September 23 - 28 , 2015 Yom Kippur / Tetra Lunar Eclipse Psyop delivery of the NNP Nations post 2015 Development Agenda and its planned JJ implementation in the context of hermeneutic analysis in the Book of Revelation . My Journey Landing Heaven on NNP by Alfred Lambremont Webre • The Final Test – Pope Launches the NNP NNP Order “ On September 26th Pope Francis ( aka Jorge Mario Bergoglio or Petrus Romanus ) will meet with the UN to launch an agreement VBN as “ The Road to Dignity by 2030 . ” This document is simply a sugar coating of Agenda 21 and relies on the myth of man-made NN NN to lock down humanity in a dystopian nightmare of total NN , total surveillance and a CD NN NN . Some Christians are calling this the beginning of the Tribulation . ” Top Picks on July 5 , 2015 at 11:07 am · No Comments “ Yet it must RB be recognized that nuclear NN , biotechnology , NN technology ; NN of our DNA , and JJ other abilities , which we have acquired , have …given those with the NN , and especially the JJ resources to use them , an impressive dominance over the whole of humanity and the entire NN … . In whose hands does all this NN lie , or will it eventually end up ? It is risky for a JJ part of humanity to have it . ” ( p.77 ) ~ Pope Francis A Papal Encyclical is a letter concerning Catholic doctrine which is circulated by the Pope . This week , Pope Francis published a JJ Encyclical : Laudato Si ’ of the Holy Father Francis – Care for Our Common Home . The 180 + page document sounds the alarm regarding the JJ degradation of living things : NNS , animals and our environment . If this document had been authored by a professor of theology , there MD be much room for common ground . However , it has been written by the leader of an institution which has been the single most powerful in the Western NN for the last 500 NNS – a period during which the central banking - warfare model has been busy harvesting our common home . There is a profound disassociation from the nuts - and - bolts of what the Catholic Church ( and its networks and investment syndicates ) have been doing and the sources of their wealth . This Encyclical is , if you will , a concept piece independent of the financial and JJ realities of the Vatican , the Catholic Church and its allies . Assuming that Pope Francis RB and foremost addressed the Encyclical to bishops , patriarchs , primates , archbishops as well as to the general population , I MD VB to propose several steps which the Pope , the Vatican and the leadership of the Catholic Church ( collectively , the “ Church ” ) might take to integrate some of the best ideas in this document into the NN lines controlled and influenced by the Church . The NN is struggling with propaganda , disinformation , and significant suppression of the truth . The JJ Pope ’s efforts to provide digital access to works in the Vatican Library on a selective basis are a good start . In the meantime , there is a great deal of NN which the Church , its libraries and networks can share : • The Church can accelerate access to both the Vatican Library and Archives . • The Church can publish all its NN regarding JJ “ black budgets . ” This MD include any NN related to invisible weaponry and technology driving the real governance systems operating on NNP NNP . • In the context of understanding what is happening to our environment , the Church can publish all its NN on JJ geo-engineering and NN NN programs as part of an open discussion to ensure that the JJ population and scientific community has accurate NNS on what is happening to our NN . • The Church can provide open access to its financial NN and persuade its affiliates , endowments and churches to do the same , including detailed disclosure on a place - VBN basis . • The Church can encourage JJ governments to publish their budgets and credit NN on a place - VBN basis . Place - VBN financial disclosure will permit the alignment of financial ecosystems with JJ ecosystems – a critical step to ensuring a healthy environment . This will create incentive systems which reward the NN and well - being of all living things . • The Church can disclose all NN on its direct and indirect involvement in any illegal activities , including vote rigging , narcotics trafficking , and NN laundering . • The Church can use its shareholdings and ownership positions in NN NNS to insist on integrity in JJ NN . • The Church can use its shareholdings in pharmaceutical and food NNS to insist on integrity and independence of scientific research . • The Church can provide a safe haven for NNS , journalists and other professionals who are targeted for upholding high standards of integrity in NN and NN . Slavery contributes significantly to the degradation of NNS throughout our NN . • The Church can withdraw from supporting governments , corporations or any other organizations that support any form of slavery . • The Church can destroy the “ NN files ” of prominent businessmen and politicians created through the use of its networks . • The Church can complete restoration efforts related to its pedophilia activities and publish complete figures on how much the Church has spent on all restoration efforts . • The Church can use its shareholdings and ownership positions in NN and corporate securities to insist on a withdrawal of corporate and NN support for NN NN , torture and slavery and the compromise of individual privacy and sovereignty . The primary source of JJ damage does not result from NN economics – quite the opposite . It results from the lethal combination of organized crime operating powerful and invisible weaponry coupled with invasive digital systems and sophisticated financial tools on scale . In short , those with the ability to kill , to destroy and to steal with impunity combine such force with fiat currencies , unsustainable debt , resource extraction , financial fraud , NN and genocide in order to centralize wealth and NN in a manner which shrinks total wealth . Lawlessness on a JJ scale must be dealt with before it destroys our NN . • The Church can divest its holdings in governments and corporations which engage in these practices . It should encourage its affiliates and members to do the same . • The Church can RB disassociate from foundations and not - for - profits that engage in these practices or that launder profits for those who do . • The Church can make clear that the ten commandments apply not just to what we do , but to whom and what we finance . • The Church can stop any and all participation by itself and its networks in narcotics trafficking and disgorge the profits of the same to the NNS harmed . No less than The Economist has rightly pointed out that we are chocking on debt , in part because we provide enormous tax subsidies which encourage debt ( VB The Great Distortion ) . Debt throws NNS out of alignment with CD another and with the environment IN them . Ditto fiat currency which is VBN in a manner to debase JJ populations and economies . We must shift to an equity - VBN financial NN which facilitates the free flow of equity unencumbered by the intervention and NN of organized crime . An equity - VBN NN – which includes the financing of JJ businesses , JJ farms and local economies with equity – will permit us to evolve a financial NN in which we can generate wealth from healing our environment and reducing consumption . • The Church can encourage these NNS by shifting the significant funds it manages as well as those managed by its networks . • The Church can encourage governments to reduce laws and regulations that prevent the local circulation of equity or that prevent the creation and success of local currency systems . A JJ culture is CD which respects the sovereignty of every individual . We respect JJ rights . We respect property rights . We respect privacy . We respect the NN of each JJ being to make up their own NN . • The Church can withdraw its investments from all governments and corporations ( including NN ) which compromise NNS ’s privacy or which manipulate them via NN NN techniques , entrainment technology , subliminal programming or electronics . • The Church can actively encourage its priests and networks to bring transparency to NN NN techniques or any efforts to mislead NNS globally . • The Church can offer sanctuary to NNS , NN personnel or journalists who bring transparency to these efforts . Before we dismiss capitalism , we should try it . Organized crime is not capitalism . It is the application of force to VB and to VB PRP ’s NN . NN economics can solve JJ of the problems before us – but we have to unleash markets to work rather than prevent them from operating and then blaming the subsequent “ mess ” on them . • The Church can call for all monies stolen by illegal means in the last CD decades to be returned , including trillions which have disappeared from the US NN or which have been accrued as a result of financial frauds prior to the bailouts . • The Church can refrain from blaming our current situation on the NNS who have been harmed by these thefts or from insisting that the subsequent JJ damage is a result of the victims ’ poor values or “ consumerism . ” • The Church can withdraw its investment from financial institutions , governments and corporations that : • Provide unlawful or unethical support to cartels and monopolies . • Engage in the purposeful suppression of technologies which MD ease the harm we are doing to the environment . The Church and its affiliates and members manage trillions in real estate and financial assets . As CD of the most significant capitalist organizations / investment networks on our NN , it can institute policies to ensure that it does not invest in NNS or governments which behave in the manner described in the latest Encyclical and that its real estate is not VBN to support such activities . During Vatican II , the Church forced the sale of significant real estate holdings which were serving communities . The proceeds from these NNS were reinvested in corporate securities . The Church can ensure that the Orders for whom these funds are managed have access to full transparency about these investments and are permitted to institute policies which ensure that these investments are managed in accordance with the goals of this Encyclical . Published JJ JJ expenditures were $ 1.7 trillion in 2013 . Add secret black budget expenditures and the total was likely much more . These funds – combined with savings from destructive behavior such as gambling , narcotics and alcohol – MD be shifted into investment in healing our environment , our education systems , our NN care systems and revitalizing JJ infrastructure . • The Church can bring transparency to all worldwide resources which are related to killing . It can invite its members to pray that these resources be shifted to investments which increase productivity rather than enable a JJ group of NNS to own and VB the NN . Both the Church and our NN are dynamic living systems . Moving to a healthy JJ culture and aligning our financial ecosystems with our JJ ecosystems is a journey . • The Church can encourage its entire network to adopt these goals in their lives so that achieving them is a partnership of the JJ for the benefit of all . • The Church can publish an annual report on its efforts to take responsibility and to achieve these goals internally in its own operations , asset managements and investments and to invite feedback from all of its constituents to VB it do so . There is often a NN that any important policy will be misunderstood or misused by those who are centralizing NN and NN . The G - 7 nations have experienced a financial coup d’etat . A great deal of NN and assets have been shifted out of sovereign governments into private hands – either illegally or under the guise of trillions in bailouts and quantitative easing – while liabilities have been shifted back into governments . Now that these transfers are complete , it MD be convenient to blame the victims and to abrogate their pensions and other savings plans and promises . It MD be unfortunate if this Encyclical were VBN to justify the value of doing so in the name of “ reducing consumerism ” or to politically outmaneuver the victims by accusing them of being “ selfish . ” Economies function on trust and such trust must come from honoring our agreements . As Pope Francis understands , it is easy to blame the victim and to take from the powerless . Utah Phillips once VBD , “ The NNP is not dying , it is being killed . And the NNS doing the killing have names and addresses . ” We commend the Pope for calling out for a cessation of the debasement of all living things . Let us hope that his latest Encyclical starts ringing doorbells – beginning with the opportunity to do so in the Church and in the Church ’s asset and investment portfolios .

text: ROCHESTER , Minn . — A longitudinal NN of 3,756 U.S. JJ students provides NN that racism in JJ schools influenced their decisions on whether to practice in minority or underserved communities . " Structural racism is deeply embedded in all areas of society , and JJ education is no exception , " according to the NN in the August issue of Academic Medicine . To examine the effect of racism in JJ school , researchers surveyed students at 49 unidentified U.S. JJ schools in their JJ semester and again in their final semester . " This NN provides NN that racism manifested at multiple levels in JJ schools was associated with graduating students ' decisions to provide care in high - NN communities , " the article concludes . " Strategies to identify and eliminate structural racism , and its manifestations in JJ school are needed . " The publication is the latest of more than 30 articles to present findings from the NNP Student Cognitive Habits and Growth Evaluation NNP ( NNP ) , the JJ longitudinal survey NN of the effects of JJ education on students ' biases and attitudes over NN . The national NN is being conducted by Oregon NNP & NNP NNP in collaboration with Mayo Clinic 's Research Group on Equity and Inclusion in NNP Care , Yale NNP and the NNP of Minnesota . To limit the scope , the NN focused on attitudes toward African Americans , although NNS explored attitudes about other groups , as well , explains JJ author Sean Phelan , Ph.D. , a Mayo Clinic NN sciences researcher . " I hope the NN will spark NN , " Dr. Phelan VBZ . " I MD VB to VB more conversation about diversity and inclusion in curriculum and the NN to make NNS in JJ training to minimize racism and bias . " The multidisciplinary team hypothesized that three factors might reflect bias in JJ education , and the results indicate that all three predicted whether students changed their minds on wanting to work in an underserved area or in a primarily minority community : • School curricula and policies can create an unintended , structural type of racism if they lack or do n't require NN on cultural awareness , racial disparities and bias , or provide experience with service learning . " We suggest that , within JJ education , the types of courses that JJ schools require and the NN that they prioritize for training JJ physicians can critically shape students ' interest in practicing in underserved areas , " Dr. Phelan VBZ . • School culture and NN , including behaviors exhibited by faculty and attending physicians , represent a hidden curriculum on acceptable or normal ways to interact . • Individual student attitudes and behaviors tended to VB over four NNS of JJ school . Students ' negative racial attitudes at matriculation were associated with decreased intention to practice with underserved or minority populations at graduation , while students who had more interactions with black students , faculty and allied NN staff , and considered those interactions favorable , were more likely to choose to practice in a black community . The team VBD that racism at the structural or cultural level MD reinforce a belief in JJ hierarchy and dissuade students from a career focused on caring for those perceived to be lower in that hierarchy . However , among students who initially intended to work with minority populations , those who witnessed examples of discrimination in JJ school were more likely to stay committed to that path . • Service learning experiences and a curriculum focused on improving minority NN were associated with increased intention to practice in underserved communities . • A curriculum focused on minority NN and disparities , students ' perceived skill at developing relationships with minority patients , a higher proportion of minority students at the school , and awareness of interracial tension in the JJ school environment were associated with increased intention to care for minority patients . " We 've been following this cohort for a JJ NN to understand how their experiences in JJ education influence the predictors of potentially biased care , " VBZ Michelle van Ryn , Ph.D. , the principal investigator . Dr. Van Ryn is the distinguished professor at Oregon NNP & NNP NNP 's School of Nursing and JJ director of Mayo Clinic 's Research Program on Equity and Inclusion in NNP Care . " These findings suggest that JJ education leaders can take NN to affect students ' decisions to work with underserved populations . " NNS began nearly CD NNS ago . Additional surveys were conducted in the second and fourth NNS of residency . The final survey will be administered five NNS after JJ school . To avoid influencing responses , the team delayed publication of findings until after students graduated from JJ school . Other co-authors from Mayo Clinic are Liselotte Dyrbye , M.D. , Richard White , M.D. , and Kristin Harden . The research was funded by the National Heart , Lung , and NNP Institute . The authors report no conflicts of interest .
